Reviews.Content: I got it on time. The day I got it I used it right away. This crappy machine is way slower than my cell phone. It makes want to go to sleep. I hardly use it anymore cuz it's way too slow and the applications that I download always either crashes or freezes all the time. Now I have to buy another one this time one with a quad core processor.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Victoria Coward
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 9 yr old son for Christmas gift paid 60 bucks and free shipping as well and they delivered it just  in time. Delivery date was the 24th of December but  i received it the 23rd so we got it right before christmas and it works good and its just perfect for him he enjoys playing games especially minecraft.  I would recommend this to someone else perfect for kids.  So I give 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Presant for a 8 year old
Reviews.Author: j.Linduff
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 8 year old for his birthday and it works great. Now when it comes to Minion rush it is a little slow, but since my 8 year old is a HUGE mine craft fan and plays all the time, its perfect. He loves it and takes it everywhere with him.

Reviews.Title: It's alright
Reviews.Author: ALS23
Reviews.Content: Good price, cool colors, but poor screen view.  It kind of hurts the eyes to look at. Is not HD at all.  The operating system seems to be okay, but not the best.  Next time, I'd rather spend the extra $50 for much better quality.

Reviews.Title: Very poor product!
Reviews.Author: YVONNE BOWDEN
Reviews.Content: I would advise you not purchase this product.  I bought three of them for my grandchildren, and they are all a problem.  The screen blacks out, chargers don't work, and if you do get it charged, it lasts for maybe 45 minutes.  If it was jus one of them, maybe just a defective item, but all three are bad.

Reviews.Title: Didnt work from day one.
Reviews.Author: shadwina
Reviews.Content: I would rate a zero if I could, it did not work from day one, I charged it per the directions and it came on but cut right off, I tried to turn it on again by holding the button for two minutes as directed, it came on but went off again within a few minutes, I got this for my daughter as a christmas present and had to send it back. I read the reviews and seen this was a problem for other buyers, I did buy a blue one for my other daughter and that one is working, but for the problem with the pink one I wouldn't suggest anyone buying one.

Reviews.Title: Really Fast and a must have for fisrst timers
Reviews.Author: Chalie Ann Davis
Reviews.Content: Got this yesterday. I really like it. I bought it for someone and he asked me to put the games and stuff on it. I have a Motorola Atrix 2 so I know that dual core and A8 cortex means something good lol because my phone runs fast and nice. Any way I really like this tablet the dispalay is nice! The camera has flash (I was surprised at that) and there is a front and rear facing camera. I know its only 4gigs so that doesnt matter all you need is a mini sd.I have to order one of these for my self just to have being that they are only $63....when i was loading the games the tablet did reset and stay on the welcome screen but after I pluged in the charged it continued to load. I hope this isnt a problem that he will encounter alot.But none the less I will be purchasing another! Maybe a pink one becuase even though my husband has his own 10" tab he likes new stuff! -____- Now that im thinking about it my 6 and 5 year old girls having a pink tablet might draw there attention o.0

Reviews.Title: Busted!
Reviews.Author: A User
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these and all three broke very quickly.  The power buttons break and are hard to get to make a connection inside.  One started showing the script that runs in the background on the screen in the foreground and the others screen cracked far too easily.  You get what you pay for I guess.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Kerri
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son and within a month it was not working right.  I wasn't able to understand the instruction guide very well when trying to fix it.  Resetting it just seemed to make things worse.

Reviews.Title: Summary
Reviews.Author: Patricia Hilliard
Reviews.Content: For the price, very good. Purchased for a 7 yr old and a 3 yr old, both use it quite well for games. Have tried it myself and prefer it over FB for one particular game,

Reviews.Title: CHEAP QUALITY DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: April Epps
Reviews.Content: The quality cheap brought for a gift a month ago my niece jes got in town to use it the charger do not charge the thing & was using USB charger 2 times now the thing wont charge at all and since we jes discovered cus it was a gift now I'm stick with crap & my 6 yr. Old niece which was excited about her gift is now sad.........

Reviews.Title: great for the money!!
Reviews.Author: chrisha emmanuel
Reviews.Content: i fine it worth it. oh GOD !! i have no tips leave meh alone. i gone laterz. stop it now eh!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work anymore
Reviews.Author: nichole sibu
Reviews.Content: This device quit working after about 3 weeks. Screen is now blue and does not function. Very disappointing. Also, for me, the screen resolution, when it did work, made me dizzy. Although I didn't expect high quality for the price.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: A. Cherry
Reviews.Content: This tablet works exactly as you would expect for the price.  Applications run a bit slow and the battery life is very poor.  Great starter tablet for a tween.

Reviews.Title: Great my children loved it and the colors were amazing! Thanks will shop again.
Reviews.Author: Kristin S.
Reviews.Content: This Tablet is a show stopper, its choice in colors help my children determine which one is theirs. It came with the Angry birds already downloaded and the shipping was extremely fast. Sleek looking and excellent quality. Just what we needed! Thanks

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: bobbie
Reviews.Content: We ordered three for our girls for Christmas and overall they worked great one of the tablets camera would not work by Amazon replaced the tablet and have not had any problems. The only complaint would it would not allow me to download Subway Surfers and many other games that my daughter's were wanting on their tablets

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7" is Great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought two, one for a 5 and 6 year old and it works!!!  Keeps them off the adult tablets and they have all their age appropriate apps right at their fingertips.

Reviews.Title: NOt as good as I expected
Reviews.Author: Kimberly S.
Reviews.Content: I have ordered 2 of these tablets.  They are decent for the price but dont last long.  They stop turning on, sometimes they dont charge , and not durable at all, not even with a case! I did order the square trade warranty which i will have to use again. i will not be buying a 3rd one.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Shernise Curry
Reviews.Content: It does what I expected and allows my son to play games as well as stay off the desktop as much.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Love this unit for the price. it is all worth it fast and clear and fun.an awesome and more fun.

Reviews.Title: SEEMS TO BE OKAY
Reviews.Author: Euthemia McMahon
Reviews.Content: I just turned this on and was trying ensure that it would operate properly. It seems to work well. Does not have that many apps loaded but the ones there seem to operate also. I like the cool blue color! I purchased this for my 5yr old to read books and play educational games. I was unable to load scholastic estoria app. Hopefully I can find another reading program for children. I like that it is a little bit smaller than the normal 7in tablets. But it has the same size screen.

Reviews.Title: Great android tablet
Reviews.Author: P Augustus "peaches"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my kid. It works well and its great for beginners. I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: My daughter likes it
Reviews.Author: Melissa Rex
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old daughter.  The batteries do not last very long, but she shouldn't be on it for more than the battery lasts anyways.  Not the best screen/clarity, but it works for a 5 year old to play games.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEVICE
Reviews.Author: JEWELLZbennett
Reviews.Content: LOVE MY TABLET. ITS GREAT OVERALL. GOOD PRICE, GOOD FEATURES. GREAT DEVICE. I ACTUALLY BOUGHT 3 OF THESE BUT ONE IS NOT WORKING . THE SCREEN KEEPS RUNNING, GUESS ITS A MANUFACTURER DEFECT AND WHEN IT START I COULD NOT RETURN IT, ( DON'T THING THEY REPAIR THEM EITHER) BUT THEY ARE GREAT OTHERWISE

Reviews.Title: Touch Screen Dont Work
Reviews.Author: emmanuel
Reviews.Content: i manage to use it for a week until the screen went out and i really wanted it for my daughter and now she is without a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Tablet is a headache
Reviews.Author: jonathan orsini
Reviews.Content: I've had numerous problems with the tablet since I opened it from the package.the charger port doesn't work anymore it keeps shutting off by it self and erases the entire tablet back to its original state

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: JH
Reviews.Content: Bought this zeepad 7" tablet for my 7 yr. old granddaughter for Christmas.  I played with it and downloaded some free games and bought some music (it does come with 2 or 3 games already on it which is good).  Then I charged it up so it would be ready to go when she opened it.  She absolutely loved it.  I did find a place to set the security also.  It worked great with our wifi and does internet searches quickly.  I think it is just as good or better than the more expensive tablets.  I love that it came with a USB cable to connect to a computer and also earphones and a stylus pen.  It also plays the music purchased from iTunes that I transferred to it and my other granddaughter's more expensive kindle will not.  If you give it as a gift and you enter your google account to download anything just remember to delete the account before you give it since it downloads your emails in the gmail.  I did have a hard time finding how to delete my google account from the tablet but once I did, it deleted the 300 emails it had downloaded.  Oh and it arrived much quicker than expected.  I think this was a great purchase for the money and would like to get one for myself.

Reviews.Title: within the year it stopped working
Reviews.Author: Paige C.
Reviews.Content: We have had it less then a year and the internal battery died. This is not the battery that you can replace or charge. Waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Starter Pad
Reviews.Author: Susan Wolff
Reviews.Content: This is a great value for a first pad. Works great and it has room to grow with you. And I love the color. Its so bright and cheerful.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Ham
Reviews.Content: The 9 year old that it was given to for a birthday gift loves it n does what she needs it to.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply produced
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift...powered it on once...worked fine.  Now it will not power one any more.I do not recommend purchasing this item as you will only be contacting Amazon shortly after you receive it for a refund.

Reviews.Title: best gift award
Reviews.Author: ksolt
Reviews.Content: Great price. works well. bought 2 for christmas gifts for my grandchildren (ages 4 and 7). they have not put them down. We got the "best" gift award from them both. would suggest getting protective case.

Reviews.Title: Good buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Ash
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 9  year old daughter as a  Christmas present.  It's a  great deal for the money and perfect for her.  We haven't had any problems so far and she loves it.  It seems nicely made and fairly sturdy so I feel like it will hold up well.

Reviews.Title: Affordable price for two weeks use
Reviews.Author: Melissa F.
Reviews.Content: Don't let the affordable price fool you into buying this product. Childrens games and Netflix are the only apps used and it freezes. Two weeks of problem free use, only trouble shooting help in the "owner's manual" says make sure it's fully charged. We have resorted to only using it while plugged in and that hasn't changed the freezing. Do not buy this product, spend more on a tablet and get something reliable.

Reviews.Title: good for target shooting
Reviews.Author: shaun
Reviews.Content: Junk would never charge an screen was horrible , pissed me off so loaded my 357 with new rounds got for Christmas an you can figure out the rest ..garbage

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought 2 Zeepad for our daugthers's Christmas. They are great! More than enough for kids!Many apps like Netflix and Skype are pre-installed, but we had the instal a newer version of Skype to do video call!One thing that could have been better: the cord is quite short! So if you want to use the tablet when charging you have to be pretty close to the outlet!

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: very good lil tab the only thing i dont like about it the battery life sucks.... buy a kindle or samsung if u want longer battery life

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: cassandra
Reviews.Content: bought this item the beginning of this year and we used it for two weeks and for the last year i have been trying to get this piece of junk to work. it keeps saying too many pattern attempts and refuses to let us login. there is no reset button to be found on this tablet and hard reseting it is impossible. so im stuck with a junk tablet and a waste of money!!!!! finding a site for the seller or product is hard and cant get any help to see what to do to try and fix it. i would recommend staying away from this brand of tablet. if you search the internet you will see where so many people are in the same boat as me with the same problem!!

Reviews.Title: Failure out of box
Reviews.Author: Jasbir Sidhu
Reviews.Content: I bought Zeepad online and failed out of box. The device was not able to get beyond initial screen and not able to unlock the device. I would recommend anybody to purchase this device

Reviews.Title: nice!!
Reviews.Author: mary_clyne
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my grand daughter and it seemed to be working OK for now. will give a better review after i see if continues working.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy it!
Reviews.Author: lace
Reviews.Content: My daughter's father bought this tablet. We followed the instruction's and let it charge for the whole 5-6 hrs. Poor battery life, screen freezes up and then the display went out. I ordered the tablet on amazon which I do not shop any more. When we tried to return it there were lots of problems. Amazon said to contact the seller the seller said contact the manufacture, so we contact the manufacturer of the tablet. They give him a address to send it to along with a money order request to fix the tablet. He sends the money order and the tablet the same week he spoke to them via phone. Two weeks later when he calls he talks to random people at the company. They tell him they have the tablet but did not have the money order. To make a long story short. He was out of a tablet and the money he spent on the tablet also the money order for the repair. Too much trouble for a cheap ass tablet.

Reviews.Title: Android
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: I really liked it - but I dropped it and had to buy a new one.  I thought maybe there would be some kind of an insurance for replacement - but since it was my fault - I would guess not.

Reviews.Title: gift for my son
Reviews.Author: charity
Reviews.Content: He really loves it. He takes it everywhere we go. It also seems very sturdy. Not very thin like other tablets. It also came with ear buds a stylus and data cable and extra screen protector.

Reviews.Title: I am happy
Reviews.Author: J. Ford
Reviews.Content: I was a little concerned about ordering since this was a Christmas present for my great grandson aged 4.  I was afraid it wouldn't arrive on time for his visit with me.  The tablet arrived on the day promised and was a wonderful gift.  (I had time to set it up so he could begin enjoying it as soon as he received it).  I would recommend this seller and won't hesitate to use them in the future.

Reviews.Title: touch pad
Reviews.Author: Richard Eagleston
Reviews.Content: This was an inexpensive way to get my granddaughter introduced to a touch pad. It works perfectly and does everything an introductory pad should.

Reviews.Title: For the price ...
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: Better not be too rough with it, it's not cheaply made but it is a rigid plastic that I think could crack if it gets tossed around much.  The OS is Android so it's reliable as any other Android device and the screen is nice and clear.  The camera is a little low res but, that's one of the sacrafices for the cost right? and I'm not trying to set the art world on fire with my tablet photos anyhow.  All in al, not bad at all for an inexpensive tablet that isn't going to go mountain climbing or river rafting with me.  I would recomend it if someone asked me about a tablet running Android OS for under $100.

Reviews.Title: I bought for my 11 year old cousin
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: He seems to like it.  There was an issue with it powering down and messing up.  It was returned for another one.  So far, there haven't been anymore issues.  I have to be somewhat neutral because I don't use the item myself.  But, I gave it a 3 star due to having to return it and get another.

Reviews.Title: Didn't last long
Reviews.Author: dquin656
Reviews.Content: Got this for my son-in-law and it barely lasted 6 months before the screen started having problems and then it wouldn't connect to the wifi in the house.

Reviews.Title: Love the Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Karen M Davis
Reviews.Content: Love my Zeepad it is more than I thought it would be. It was as described love it and great price.

Reviews.Title: buzzes and gets hot
Reviews.Author: Eric Staab
Reviews.Content: It has a horrible buzz.  It also seems to get very hot.  It no longer works with netflix (may be a netflix problem or may be a software problem): it used to show movies but no longer finds the movie file when you go to play it in netflix.  I am going to try a memory chip (expansion) to see if it helps.  Cheap, but you kinda get what you pay for.  I have no idea how to update the software on this to try to get it to work again.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift for Kids
Reviews.Author: Patricia Neal
Reviews.Content: Love this item. Small and compact but works great. Clear screen and does pretty much what a computer would do. Great for kids who love to play games.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing Purchase
Reviews.Author: Ercillia Tyson
Reviews.Content: My tablet was not what I expected when I got it. Yes, it was green like the picture, but when I turned it on the tablet read Android 4.1 instead of 4.0. Not only that but it only had 504mb instead of the 512mb, and it had more options to choose from than in the 4.0 I'd ordered around the same time with the choice of making an owner profile under Security and to calibrate the screen under Settings; however, this tablet didn't last long at all. One drop from my 4 year old niece and the device split a little on one side and both the power and volume button popped out cleanly with no clear way to put them back in besides to take the tablet apart, something I had no plans of doing, and put it back in. Thank goodness for the SquareTrade warranty!Before it broke, I found that I could not connect this tablet, or the other tablet for that matter, to my computer using the provided USB cord without it shutting off automatically. Meaning that I couldn't add any of the pictures or music to the tablet like I had planned to. Not only that, but the camera quality is absolutely TERRIBLE!! Even in a bright room or direct light from a desk lamp wasn't enough to help when trying to improve the images. Each picture left the person several shades darker than they actually were and with a red haze of sort over it all.

Reviews.Title: Fully recommended, excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: morivic perdomo
Reviews.Content: excellent product for my son, it is fast, very good picture, if we compare price and quality is an option maginifica actually buy two more.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Iwona Zrodlo
Reviews.Content: it is a good tablet for biggniners for kids becouse it is easy to operate and my kids like it

Reviews.Title: CAMERA DOESNT WORK WITH APPLICATIONS!!
Reviews.Author: Amy Kim
Reviews.Content: When we try to video using skype or oovoo, his camera doesnt work. It works fine when using it for regular pics and videos but when we try to use it for the applications, the applications dont recognize that the device has a camera! We tried every setting and option but for some reason, the camera on the device is unrecognized.Though we can still talk, this is quite annoying since the main reason why I got this for him is to be able to see him...Other than that it works fine. If anyone has any solutions to help with my problem, please help.

Reviews.Title: My wasted money down the drain and I can't even get any results to help recoup my money are new tablets....Will never buy tablet
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: It stopped working and I bought 2 of the one for my grandaughter and one for me, hers stopped working 3 months ago and mine 2 months ago.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Michael Wells Glueck "EditAndPublishYourBook.com"
Reviews.Content: I agree with reviewers who found the Wi-Fi reception weak or intermittent. Sometimes it was necessary to switch to airplane mode while on land or sea. And it wasn't always possible to enter words in a search box. Finally, the battery lasts for only one hour before requiring recharging and causing the tablet to shut down automatically. I bought and sold this tablet within four days. Enough said?

Reviews.Title: Junk.  Pure junk.
Reviews.Author: Salty
Reviews.Content: Returning this tomorrow.  Perhaps I'm just spoiled by my previous tablet, that sadly quit charging, but this is a piece of junk. I found that the screen was impossible to change the settings.  I first thought it was the brightness, but had my bf check it out, and he couldn't fix it so it looked even halfway normal.  It's the slowest ever when attempting to open a browser to the internet.  We messed around with googling quite a few sites, and found that our patience just ran out.  Even attempting to play Candy Crush on this messed with our eyes and minds.  The gems moved at a snails pace, and the colors were so skewed, we just quit.  Rather disappointing.  Netflix took forever to load, often stopped to buffer, and the color/brightness/settings were so distorted, it was unwatchable.Not gonna mess with it, perhaps it could just be this unit, but I'm returning it to find a different product that actually has some quality to it.

Reviews.Title: ONE OF A KIND UNIQUE.AND IS COMPACT AND NOT DIFFICULT TO HANDLE.IS CUTE AND I LOVE THE SIZE GREAT ELECTRONIC FOR KIDS..
Reviews.Author: BARBARA REYES
Reviews.Content: THE COLOR.THE SERVICE.THE WHOLE TABLET I LOVE AND ENJOY.ESPECIALLY AS A GIFT FOR CHILDREN.I BROUGHT MULTICOLORS AS WELL.AND IT WAS EASY TO ORDER.

Reviews.Title: Never buy this!
Reviews.Author: jennifer cook
Reviews.Content: it worked for an hour after that it would never load back up again. so i hate it and would never buy this again.

Reviews.Title: No worth it, spend the extra money
Reviews.Author: April Lessig
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my boys...they both stopped charging within 6 months. I have had someone at my job, an IT tech, to look at them and they are not repairable. Completely not worth purchasing. I wish I could return them both now. Lesson learned.

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: portia hardin
Reviews.Content: zeepad freezes up constantly, have had less than a year and the on button is stuck. cannot turn on. I guess I got what 79 dollars is worth. will stick with ipad next time. thanks

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the money
Reviews.Author: Brittany McClearen
Reviews.Content: Has a few glitches and sometimes is pretty slow but for the price, this isn't a bad buy at all.

Reviews.Title: 7"Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Sharon C. Smith
Reviews.Content: My daughter is very happy with her Zeepad purchased through Amazon. She lives on it. It does pretty much what the expensive tablets do. Its really a great buy. If I didnt already have a tablet, I would buy it for myself.

Reviews.Title: Good product! but i cant find a case please help
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: I love the wopd 8!!!! Its huge!! Bigger than i thought!! But if anyone can find out where to get a case for this product plese tell me.

Reviews.Title: Tablet Review
Reviews.Author: Dogrgreat
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a low cost tablet for a Friend in the Philippines and this Fit the BillIt has a good price and the product works fineI needed assistance setting up the Wifi for this Tablet, so I did a search on the Internet and there is a lot of information  for this tablet, I followed the instructions and the WiFi is workingIt has been in use,for several months and so far, so goodI feel that this tablet is very good for the price

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Jacki Deckard
Reviews.Content: The screen doesn't work well. I have only had it a short time and used it maybe 10 times due to the fact that the screen doesn't work well at all. Sometimes it doesn't work at all. Wish I had pd more and gotten a better product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service
Reviews.Author: M. Rue
Reviews.Content: This is my second purchase of the same item from this company. The first time I purchased this item and few months later the back camera was not working. I contacted to company who was more than happy to assist me with an exchange. The delivery time was shorter than expected and the prices for the product you just cant beat. This ultimately resulted in my return business now purchasing another Zeepad with this company. Keep up the great customer service!!

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: Debbie Mclean-roache
Reviews.Content: This works fine for a five year old. Did not expect it to perform like a galaxy tab or something more expensive. Its worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: leorock
Reviews.Content: Cheap tablet, not durable, LCD screen got a black line across the screen after a few months of use. Recommended only for little children.

Reviews.Title: 2 out of 3 still working!
Reviews.Author: Justsilvie
Reviews.Content: Bought 3 for Christmas gift for my grandchildren. Two out of three still work, the third stopped working after 6 months. If I had bought it locally I would have tried to take it back with my receipt since my son could not find the original packing and warranty info.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Tomoe Murai
Reviews.Content: My first tablet. I just wanted to read free PDF or EPub books in the train and occasionally write/read email.For the purpose, this is great. It may be slow for internet browsing, Android is not the latest and the battery doesn't run too long, but good enough for my use. Transferring files from/to PC is really simple. The price is hard to beat.Only the con is the color (red). For some reason other colors were $10 more expensive, then, red is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy.
Reviews.Author: Shellz
Reviews.Content: Screen vision is poor.  Browser is slow. The battery run low very fast.  Don't like it at all.  Save your $70 for something better.

Reviews.Title: Nice!!
Reviews.Author: Winter Tanner
Reviews.Content: My little cousin loves it. There was no problems. It actually shipped really fast. I would totally recommend it to people who has a little child or anyone that's really young

Reviews.Title: zee tab
Reviews.Author: JERZEE2MATO
Reviews.Content: Best tablet for a kid for the price......came in less than a week....has everything a better model  tab has...

Reviews.Title: bought for a gift
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: my bf bought this for a gift for his little teen cousin. it was just ok for us because when we got it we tried it out and it was slow but great for a child or teen. she seem to enjoy it when she got her gift.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I ordered.
Reviews.Author: adam minnicks
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these for my kids' birthdays and the company said they were used but in good condition. They were brand new with nothing touched. They work perfectly for my kids aged 6 and 9. They can play their little games and go on youtube like they were doing with mommy's kindle. Now they don't have to use mommy's or fight over just having one tablet. Wifi works great, and the company sent them right on time. I'm very happy as usual with amazon. I always find a great deal on here.

Reviews.Title: Great for my 8 year old!
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: This is perfect for my daughter's 1st tablet! It came loaded with some of her favorite games and its super fast for her to download new ones.  It turned right on and connected to our wifi with no problems.

Reviews.Title: It works - Kinda
Reviews.Author: ariona_lie
Reviews.Content: Well where do I start with this thing. I read the review, but they were pretty mixed so I decided to try it myself. Now, when we first got it, we let it charge ALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL Night (xmas eve) My daughter was so excited, but - well it wouldnt turn on... FINALLY after another day of charging it turned on. Reviews.Title: Really nice for the price!
Reviews.Author: E. Scinta
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 10yr old daughter because she wanted a tablet of her own. I didn't want to spend a lot of money in case she broke it or didn't take care of it, so after looking on here and reading all the reviews I bought her this one. I gotta say I was really surprised with this because I was expecting it to be on the lower quality side because of the price. But it's actually really nice. Have a lot of pros and some cons for this tablet:Pros:-Very heavy duty but still light weight which I like. Seems like it'll last longer and it doesn't seem like it'll break easy if dropped.-Came with a bunch of stuff including charger, stylus, headphones and 2 USB chords-Very easy to set up WiFi and all the time/location settings.-Going between screens, closing out programs and personalizing tablet is super easy to do.-WiFi connectivity is great and have had no problems connecting to the house router and actually picked up a ton of other routers in the area too when it was searching for connections.-Touch screen works great. Using the stylus works even better.-All apps seem to work well - liked how there were a lot already installed like YouTube and Angry Birds.-Big pro for me was that you can turn this tablet off and on to save battery life. And it doesn't just go into "sleep mode" like the ipad, it actually turns off which is very nice.-Like how there's a slot for the SD card to add more storage to device.-Camera seems to work great. Can take pictures or record video and switch between the dual cameras. (Resolution is meh though - see below in 'Cons')-Charging is actually really quick. Takes maybe an hour or so to get the battery up to 100% once it's down to nothing.-Gets all the same apps as the iPad using the Google Play store (pretty much it's just like an Android phone but bigger and you can't make phone calls)Cons:-Will lag if you have too many programs open at the same time (which makes sense as the memory isn't that high).-Speakers aren't all that great. I think that's why they included the headphones because the highest volume is still kind of hard to hear sometimes depending on what you're listening too.-Resolution is alright. Not as good as the ipad or Windows tablet though. But it's not horrible, just not HD or anything.I'd definitely recommend this for a kid that wants a tablet. So far my daughter LOVES this and hasn't put it down since we gave it to her.

Reviews.Title: Lasted 6 months with light use and no abuse...
Reviews.Author: Cevyn L. Miles-monaghan
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet for my wife to play casual games on.  For that purpose, and considering the low price, it works great.  Mine came with Jelly Bean pre-installed.  The box even says "Jelly Bean" on it.  The About screen in the OS confirms this as well.  Unlike other ZeePads with Android ICS, this updated model was NOT rooted out of the box.The first thing I did to prep this for her was to root it using "Root with Restore by Bin4ry", from the XDA forums, and then installed Ad-Away and Root Cleaner.  I also uninstalled the apps and games she doesn't use to free up some memory - root not required.Battery life is so-so.  A couple hours of gaming will kill it, but it lasts a decent amount of time for other tasks.  The back of the tablet does get quite warm while gaming.  Performance is decent, however a task killing app is useful for freeing up some memory.  The screen is OK as well and responds to touch accurately.  The viewing angle is quite limited compared to a high end IPS display, though the update speed is plenty fast for her games and doesn't exhibit motion blur.I didn't find any Chinese spamware on this tablet as I did on the Star N9500 phone that I purchased and reviewed here on Amazon.UPDATE 02-20-2014: The tablet has degraded substantially with light use.  Random lockups, reboots, green lines on the screen and other anomalies make it pretty much unusable.  I even flashed the latest stock firmware, and without any additional apps installed the same problems are present, indicating hardware failure.

Reviews.Title: Mixed feelings
Reviews.Author: Wayfinder
Reviews.Content: I hate writing this kind of review, because I don't know whether to review the product or the advertising/shipping.  So, giving it 3 stars as a "belated thumbs up".THE PRODUCT.  The Zeepad itself is fairly awesome.  It's decently fast.  Decently responsive.  I like the way Android is set up on it-- not a bunch of extra brand-specific garbage.  Easy to use.  Speaker is acceptably loud.  No bluetooth but that's as advertised.  Love the multi-function USB port.  Love that it charges either from the charger port or USB.  For the price, this is an impressive little tablet.  Didn't like the 800x400 screen pixels... too few really.  But it works and aside from typical "short freeze" lag factors common in Android devices, this is a great little system at $70.  The device itself I give a solid 4+ stars.THE SHIPPING and ADVERTISING.  Not so spiffy.  The ad seems to change from time to time and what was originally listed as "up to 1200 x 600 graphics resolution" turned out to be significantly less.  In truth, 800x400 just doesn't quite cut it.  It limits the number of icons one can have on one screen.  Now if that had been advertised would be fine.  Noticed at times the screen says just that.  But at other times it advertises the 1200 x 600 and (while I don't know why), that's going to cause problem expectations.But the real problem I had (and what knocked this down to 3 stars), when purchased from "WorryFree Gadgets"... it came shipped in its own box loose-packed inside an Amazon box-- no padding to keep it from bumping around.  Meh, these packages take quite a bit of bumping anyway, so not too worried.  But... Amazon box was in fine shape while the Zeepad box was significantly crushed.  Since the outer box was fine, that means it was PACKED in that condition.  As a result while the Zeepad itself seemed okay, the screen protector packed as a "bonus item" in the top of the box was also crushed.  Not happy with that.The bonuses were nice.  The Zeepad stylus, the screen protector (if it hadn't been damaged *at the time of shipping*), the mini-usb adapter, everything was fine.  But I don't have much tolerance for a merchant taking a visibly and significantly damaged box and going ahead and shipping it without even inspecting the contents.  That's lazy and it's just not right.So... three stars.  Like other users I give the Zeepad itself a thumbs-up value-for-the-buck rating.  For the shipping and merchant care, not so much.  The question I have:  was it shipped directly from the merchant or from Amazon itself?  The screen said "Sold by Goodios and Fulfilled by Amazon."  So which is it... Worry-Free Gadgets, Goodios or Amazon to blame for shoddy packing?  Who crushed the inner box and who sent it out in that condition?  Dunno.  It got it returned though, and Amazon was great about that as always... with a refund to my account in less than 24 hours and free UPS pickup (just cannot beat Amazon on customer service).This is a product that cannot be exchanged, only returned.  That's fine because in truth, I want a bit better resolution screen if available-- and the new Zeepads are just now hitting the market with DOUBLE THE MEMORY for about $10 more (nice coincidence there).Despite the problems I still <3 Amazon, and the Zeepad is everything everyone raves about.  For a starter Android tablet or one for kids... this is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my 4 year old
Reviews.Author: Bryan "hydrophoid"
Reviews.Content: No one is going to love working on this tablet, but at the price point I hope no one is expecting to work on this tablet (you could do some work with it but you would not like it).Overall this is a great tablet for the price. My wife and I debated getting our 4 year old a LeapPad for educational games, but I was able to win out by pointing out the cost of many Android games: free.The screen has a small viewing angle and the resolution isn't the best, my daughter loves playing the ABC and puzzle games we downloaded for her. I have not purchased any software for her, but the free games on Play are awesome. This thing even runs Candy Crush (just in case you were wondering :).I wish this didn't have a proprietary charging end on it (it has a USB port, but that is not for charging) but my other tablets also have proprietary charging ports so it seems to be standard for them to make a different port.The box was full of goodies: charging cable, usb adapter (so you can plug in full sized usb items to the tablet), a stylus, AND a screen protector. They really delivered on the packaging.This tablet is really a bargain for the price, it wont win any processor speed awards and it can hang at times but if you are in the same boat and looking for something to entertain your children during long drives or you want to use some type of electronic game/learning system this is priced to be in your top 5 list of purchase considerations. On the other hand, if you are an adult looking for something to surf the web/look for jobs/ do any type of professional work with, I would suggest a different more powerful (and likely expensive) tablet.Willie-B

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "JT"
Reviews.Content: This is great for my grandson with downs syndrome. He broke the glass and they even repaired it for $20.00

Reviews.Title: Teenage daughter loves it.
Reviews.Author: MommaFoo
Reviews.Content: My daughter especially loves the front-facing camera and uses it to Skype with her friends.  Does the same and more as my Kindle.  She's had it a few weeks now and so far so good!

Reviews.Title: Was the quality of this item above or below your expectations
Reviews.Author: María Eusebia Díaz Guerrero
Reviews.Content: The product is brand is not offered in the notice, did not bring security, did not bring the manual or the bonus offered in the bid. All this calls into question its quality and durability.

Reviews.Title: Great Kids Tablet, Okay Quality, Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought four (yes, 4) of these for my kids for Christmas 2012. So they have been through more than six months of regular use. For $70 these are pretty good. They are definitely not iPads, Google Nexus, or Samsung Galaxies, but they are a good buy for your average 4 to 8 year olds. At this point, three of the four are still working and two of the four are working well. They work well for playing games, reading ebooks, watching movies, or taking silly (albeit low quality) pictures of oneself. They do all this just as well a Nexus.About two months ago one the tablets stopped charging, the battery still had a small charge (not enough to power up) and the charger was working. Something stopped working in the charging circuits on the motherboard. So that one is no longer usable.All but one of the chargers has stopped working, I think the wire or plug is too weak and broke, they worked if you wiggled the plug. Also the charging receptacle in the tablets is weak, one tablet's does not work anymore. And the USB port of another does not work. This has probably as much to do with the kids jamming and yanking on the cord, as anything.Fortunately, the USB connector does charge the tablet, so even without any of the chargers you can still use the tablets.The third tablet is very slow to react when tapping on the screen. This is most noticeable on the home screen, but also when playing games, though not as bad.Very odd, seems more of a software based problem than hardware.The fourth tablet, so far (knock on wood) is working fine no problems at all. Battery life has never been that great, two hours or so max. It hasn't diminished in six months so they are good quality, just not that big. Keep a smart phone charger on hand and they will last as long as you've got gas in the car.Overall, I am pleased with these tablet. Especially for younger kids, when you don't want to throw a lot of money down the drain (literally!) Trust me, I know, before they got these, my wife's Nexus, ended up in the toilet when two kids tried to grab it at the same time. Fortunately, it still works fine.We know they can take care of them now, so we will upgrade them one at a time, as they stop working. So far only one has had to be replaced. Pretty good as far as I'm concerned.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Sultan Khan
Reviews.Content: Its kind of cool Android tablet for kids but lacks little bit of speed. I would say you get what you pay for ...I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: AllLOSER -- the screen was lifted from the bezel had to return it.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!

Reviews.Content: I recently bought this for my daughters birthday (7) knowing nothing about tablets and was really pleasntly surprised. I didn't give it to her yet because her birthday is still a little ways away but I have been playing with it, setting up the apps she likes moving the things she will play the most to the home screen, things like that, and its very easy to use and manuver. The size is going to be perfect for her and the price you cant beat. Its not an ipad so dont expct perfection, but if u have a tech savy kid and are tired of the old " its my turn on moms phone!" between siblings then this is for you! My only complaint is I have yet to figure out the parentel controls but close monitoring should be a close second to blocking. And I also wanna give it up to Goodios for prompt delivery and a courtesy email asking how I liked my product so far. I feel if you wanna buy this tablet, this would be the company to buy from.

Ordered another one and again the screen popped off and snapped it back on and would't turn back on. Returning the second one today. Will pay a little extra and get a Kindle Fire. The tablet that I received (I ordered two) loaded the wi-fi easily enough but the charger cord did not work after three charges and usb port did not work after the second plug in.  Yes, I opened it and saw that the port wasn't connected.  Then the tablet no longer accessed the wi-fi so I could not connect to the internet.  Because both tablets have been used and neither one works, I am stuck paying over $150.00 for items that do not work.  I have a few items that require a usb plug in and haven't had a problem at all with them. Maybe I got a lemon but either way, I will not order electronics from Amazon any more because the return policy is to restricted.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: nikkih
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my seven year old son for his birthday. I did not want to put a lot of money in it being I was afraid that he will drop it. After reading reviews after reviews I bought it. This is perfect for him. I have not had any problems with it freezing up. While he has an account for g.c. to buy games there are plenty of free games and books.  The stylus has already torn. It has a rubber bottom that is used on the screen and it has come apart. No big deal use your fingers. There are no set parental controls on it, but my husband went on google and manually set controls for graphic material. So you can set controls it just takes a bit to do. THe battery isn't as long as an Ipad or other high end tablets, but that is a positive in my book. It usually last a good hr to hour and half of active use.  Overall I believe this is a good buy for a kid to have a tablet. If he breaks it I feel like I don't have a ton of money in it.

Reviews.Title: Both were defective
Reviews.Author: Mary Lewis-Chacon
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these pads hoping to get a good one.  Both were defective and the seller who took the money 2 months before they sent the product would not even answer my e-mail.  All I wanted was to have this fixed.  I would recommend only buying products sold by Amazon.  The customer service they give is eccellent.  I now watch who is selling the product.  I will never buy from bestinternational agian.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Brought this for my daughter....she loves it. She dropped it really good once..I snapped it back together and it still works. Great for a kids; Angry Birds,Temple Run, all those work. Buy this for ya kids.

Reviews.Title: Little detail
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablets a few months ago, the carrier company had some troubles transporting my package (to Venezuela) and I've recieved it 2 weeks ago. I'm very glad with 2 of the 3 tablets, very usefull, fast and elegant, but one of those came with a problem in the charger output, I have to push a bit left the charger or it will not charge the tablet, i though it could be some crashes in the travel. I recomend this product 100%

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0 Tablet
Reviews.Author: Keith Johnson "Livon"
Reviews.Content: This item was a gift to my mother she always wanted a small tablet to work with by doing her daily task to keep up with todays world of smart techs. So you know how it is with the older people to learn these computer gadgets.

Reviews.Title: horrible!!!!
Reviews.Author: maria marion
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my daughter, everything was in Arabic, and I couldn’t find any setting in English,When I tried messing with it, it kept turning off and on .  I called the store but nobody Answered

Reviews.Title: Zee Pad
Reviews.Author: kelly mancini
Reviews.Content: Great tablet, awesome for young kids! Second zee pad I have bought, I suggest getting the gel skin cover though to protect it from dropping by the kids.

Reviews.Title: Birthday Gift
Reviews.Author: melinda trosper
Reviews.Content: I bought this zeepad for my 7 year old granddaughters birthday. She LOVES it. I love that she LOVES it. It does everything she wants it to do.I am very pleased with this zeepad. No regrets, and certainly not any disappointments.

Reviews.Title: purchaced 3 not 1 works!

Reviews.Content: purchaced 3 of these for my children. 1 won't connect to the internet, 1 of the screens is broken (view) and the other takes about 5 minute just to get to one site.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made
Reviews.Author: C. Carter
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 year old grand daughter and she LOVES it. I just didn't like how it distorts the screen when pressing on the back of it. It was cheaply made. Luckily, I purchased a case for it so that provides protection to the back and prevents my grand daughter from having issues with it. I give it a 4 star rating because it runs the OS extremely well and it runs the top apps also. Overall I think I made the right choice purchasing this for my grand daughter. She uses the Kindle and Netflix apps with not problems.

Reviews.Title: People claim reviews are fake which scared me, but I've given the time after receiving the product and have no complaints!
Reviews.Author: B. Mortinson
Reviews.Content: I ordered quickly after seeing high reviews. There was a delay with it being sent, and after closer overlook of reviews I found some pretty bad ones. I was fearful, so I took a couple weeks to be sure all was well. The product arrived within the time allotted. Weve had no problems with a power button, or battery problem, charging, nothing. It is a great product! Especially for the price!!!! Thanks!***UPDATE almost 6 mo later** A couple months ago the product stopped charging. Ive seen others on here also complaining of problems with the charging port but figured Id figure something out or it was cheap enough to just buy my daughter a higher quality tablet in the future. What I believe to be the problem it on the charger the metal piece is wobbly. Its loose and it makes sense because ive read of others piece getting stuck within the port. Ours hasnt. I hope to get some sort of response or help because were trying to find a charger for it and I have no idea what to do. I understand this product is low cost and it is a quality product for the price but if the chargers arent working and keep being loose we cant use the product. *****

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: Wardell Willis
Reviews.Content: I love it and also my granddaughter.  It was a replacement for a Christmas gift which was dropped and destroyed.  She love it.  Will order another.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Randy Countryman
Reviews.Content: I love the color of it. It was a gift for my daughters birthday. She enjoys it. It's kind of slow, but does what she wants.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Mama Cayenne "Marie"
Reviews.Content: Great price, really gets a lot of use.  Easy to use no problems.  Will probably order another one for my 8 yr old.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Cati Holker
Reviews.Content: Wow, I wish I would have taken the bad reviews on this product more seriously.It took a LONG time for the product to come.  Shipment tracking was poor and non-specific.When I finally received the tablet, I was relieved (I was beginning to think I had been ripped off), and overall, I was happy with the tablet.Not ONE MONTH later, the power button became depressed/lodged and now my tablet is rendered useless. The tablet charges and the screen is active, but I cannot turn it on.  I contacted the company and have received no answer.This company is based in China, so correspondence can be difficult due to the language barrier.  This isn't a deal-breaker on it's own for me, in addition to everything else, it's just a tad bit frustrating.$80 wasted.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Arnold Keith Thurston "Keith"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift. The feedback has been positive.  It was compared to a large version of a phone.  Only complaint was a little slow at times.

Reviews.Title: no so bad
Reviews.Author: Gabriel
Reviews.Content: sometimes it freezes, and the scrren does not work, you press and press and stay like nohing happens, i purchased it for a little girl,,,,  so she is not going to use it that often... so, it is ok for her

Reviews.Title: Mine came defective/damaged can't get through to amazon cs.
Reviews.Author: yeahaboutthat
Reviews.Content: The 2 stars is for this product's performance, not amazon's poor customer service of course. (Just wanted to say that before anyone jumps down my throat) Bought for my mom, who has cancer and lives with me. I handled it mostly to help her set it up and we noticed problems right off the bat. We weren't expecting anything fancy, but to work and be able to get some use out of it would have been appropriate for the price paid I think. We charged it to full first thing, set it up a little bit, turned it off with the charge at 74 percent and turned it back on 30 minutes later to discover the battery had completely drained. To our disappointment, it does that every time. The touch screen is unresponsive at times especially in certain areas, you have to press really hard and sometimes even then it does not respond. There are specks in the back of the lcd screen, enough to be bothersome when using. My mom is too polite to want to return it when I mentioned it she said no, she already threw out the box it came in anyways and said it'll be alright and she feels bad. At first it was extremely slow to charge, taking hours to just get even halfway, and sometimes after it has been charged all the way and she disconnects the charger the full charge goes right back down to only a barely charged within seconds without doing anything. I have been trying to contact amazon's customer service, I remember years ago they had the best customer service if ever there was a problem, now I can't even get ahold of them. I don't have a phone with minutes right now but have been trying to submit their online forms and have been getting a "We're sorry. There was an error trying to send your e-mail. Please try again in a few minutes or contact us by phone." Message. I have been trying several times a day everyday, it doesn't look like they are fixing the form problem. I have scoured the internet for their customer service address but it seems like all of them have been disabled. Extremely disappointed with this product and with amazon's customer service, they lost a long time customer. Again, rating I gave strictly for product performance only, just had to throw in my problems with customer service in this experience to maybe save someone else the trouble.

Reviews.Title: This product is pretty awesome
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I love that the pc devices are becoming so small and we still can do so much with them. Looking forward to seeing what technology will come up with next.

Reviews.Title: 7yr old daughter loves it.
Reviews.Author: Natasha S.
Reviews.Content: Tablet is being used by my daughter. She loves it, great size for a child. We added a microSD card and downloaded about 15 games from the Google Play store. User manual is pretty thin but if you are familiar with android operating systems you can figure it out. Probably not great for heavy usage as it can lag but like I said, great for a kid.

Reviews.Title: Does the job nicely.
Reviews.Author: Danger
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter.  Seems to work well and is cheaper than an ipod touch.There are plenty of apps and it seems to work well, other than the battery life is about 3-4 hours.It's screen is lower resolution than the iphone 5 or ipad 3,  but it's perfectly fine for her usage.  I don't want her on the internet or doing e-mail or facebook yet!*** Update,  after not using the device for a week and attempting to boot the device,  it never got past the post screen.  I even tried entering Android diagnostic mode and couldn't get it going.  So I've returned it to the manufacturer for a refund.  I guess you get what you pay for and the fact that nexus 7 and galaxy tab 2's are only $50 more these days,  I was taught a lesson in not skimping on the kids ;-)

Reviews.Title: Great product for kids
Reviews.Author: Happy customer
Reviews.Content: The zeepad tablet works great, my kids love it, they enjoy playing angry birds and other preloaded games.I can check my email, facebook and use skype to talk to my mom. It really works great.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the money
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Tubbs
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my 11yr son who loves "screens", and as a trial for owning this type of electronic. If he took care of this, we would move up to something like an iPad.  I decided to play with it first and perhaps add a few apps and music.  All went well until I got hooked on playing Angry Bird.  During my many nights of playing Angry Bird, the screen began to freeze.  I had to hit the power button once to turn it off (but not shut down) and then back on again in order to continue my game.  I certainly decided to NOT buy this for myself, but he seemed to enjoy it and worked around that problem.  He even watched Netflix movies and YouTube videos on it.  I'm not sure it he still had problems with it freezing.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Sherell Hill
Reviews.Content: Very great buy! I had an issue with it and sent it back to the manufacturer. They sent a new one back and its been awesome since then. I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: 7" zeepad
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: it works but is a bit slow .....roku is a better buy thans this,UNLESS you want it to be portable

Reviews.Title: Happy with this product!
Reviews.Author: T. Hill
Reviews.Content: Received this tablet on time. It is responsive and easy to use. I would recommend it if you are seeking an inexpensive tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Pamala W. Gambrell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my tech savvy 3 year old nephew. He LOVE it! When he has this Zeepad in his hands, he doesn't tear up the house.

Reviews.Title: worst tablet ever.
Reviews.Author: Jmerc
Reviews.Content: I don't get the persons who gave these tablets high reviews because they stink.  I understand for the money you get what you pay for but man these turned out bad.  First off the power supply broke all on it's own then the port became loose and you had to hold the cord on a angle for it charge. The screens scratched easily and one even cracked. They would freeze up and you had to reset it and the battery didn't last long at all. My cell phone worked better than this product. So save yourself the trouble and don't waste both your time and money! Your better off spending some money and getting  a good brand tablet. As always "you get what you pay for!"

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Dina J Green
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a xmas gift for my grandson and according to my daughter it is awesome! Its even better than the one she at a different story and different maker for my oldest granddaughter. Now my granddaughter wants the same exact one!

Reviews.Title: Make a different purchase
Reviews.Author: meshop2
Reviews.Content: This is a purchase I regret making.  It has many issues- including disconnecting from the internet, screen freezing up, slow to respond to a command.  Sometimes it won't turn on or off.  Also the front screen is plastic.  It came scratched and since then has bubbled up in places.  Very cheap.  I guess you get what you pay for.  I would not recommend this Zeepad to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Dissatisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: Becky Porter
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item as a gift for my kids thinking it would be a great starter tablet.  Once we received the item, I was very happy with how easy it was to start using and the speed of the apps, specifically Netflix, as my kids watch their favorite shows on it.  And then it went downhill.  I had this product LESS THAN ONE WEEK when it completely stopped working. We used it to watch a movie on Netflix one evening.  I turned it off after using it and we went to bed.  The next afternoon, I attempted to turn it on so we could watch a movie since it was raining.  And nothing.  Would not turn on. I tried charging the tablet and nothing worked.  Needless to say, I was less than pleased.  What pushed me over the dissatisfaction edge is that when returning this item, I had to pay for return shipping; that shipping (since it is international) costs me $26.  So not only am I currently out the money I spent on the item, I am now out an extra $26 because I was sent a defective product.  I can understand if I wanted to return this product for my own simple reason paying the shipping. But when this product was defective and lasted less than one week after I received it, making me pay the return shipping is not the way to keep me as a customer.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the money.
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Have an ongoing problem with using the charger.  Have to wiggle the plug around to get it to charge.  Other than that, the tablet is a pretty good item.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: Came with Angry Birds, Fruit Ninja, and a few other games pre-loaded which was nice. I was also able to download various apps from the Google PlayStore with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Took awhile, but its good
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: Took about a week longer than they said and it practically was bare bones, no games or apps on it like the first one I ordered. But it wasn't a problem since I still had the history of my Google store from my other one. I simply downloaded the apps and its working fine. Power button does have the tendency to get depressed into the case sometimes though and is a pain to take apart and pull it out, but overall happy with the device.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad tablet
Reviews.Author: travistodd
Reviews.Content: Hi I only had this produced for a few hours , In that time I spent the first two hours charging the tablet at the instructions said to do . Once it was Charged I tried to look  throw the programs , and how to get around all the wig jets and icons . I am not all the happy with it I found it to be a bit to slow , the camera 's picture was very grainy. I Think this would be best for some one that is real good with android systems . And some one that has real good eye sight. The price is grate. the size is grate for a child, and it seem;d to be made quit good .

Reviews.Title: after a week it would not turn on
Reviews.Author: patty
Reviews.Content: it worked fine for awhile then i went to turn it on and it wouldnt turn on realize it was inexpensive but was expecting more

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: nicole
Reviews.Content: I knew buying this I was not going to get top of the line. It freezes occasionally (usually when it idles for a while), but I just simply turn it off and back on. Easy to use system, only took me about 2 minutes to figure it out without using the manual. I bought it for my three year old son and serves its purpose. I would say if it can hold up to my three year old it is pretty durable.

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Raffi
Reviews.Content: Works great form my 2 1/2 year old. little slow but for the price it is a ok product. Not as sturdy

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: destiny N.
Reviews.Content: i bought this product and gave it to a family member in another country, and they love it. It came in excellent timing and i still shocked as to how they got to me so quickly. Easy to use as well, thinking of getting 2 more for my kids.The price isnt bad but my boys are 4 and 6 and dont want to spend that much on it.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED AND EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "BiloxiGal"
Reviews.Content: I got this for limited use while traveling back and forth to work on public transportation. I use it as an ebook reader more than anything.  It's exactly what I wanted.  I tried the least expensive Kindle, and found I just couldn't live with no color on the screen. I can download my ebooks from Amazon using the wi-fi at home with no problems.  The wi-fi setup didn't take any time at all.  The cost of the tablet is such that if I lose it or it disappears while taking it back and forth, I won't feel too bad.  I can also check my email once I get to work on a nearby open wi-fi network if I want to.  I installed a 16 gig sd card on it with some music files yesterday, but haven't tried it yet.  However, the transfer was a breeze.  My computer recognized the tablet, and the tablet showed the USB symbol that let me use it as another drive.I am very satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Deion
Reviews.Content: i got scrathed really easily but it was good and it also legged aloti couldnt play bike race and stuff like that

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET!
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: First of all it came straight from China and took almost a month to arrive. I bought it for my 14 year old daughter who is very tecno savvy more so than I. It worked for one day then half the screen stopped working and the image wouldn't rotate when you moved the tablet up and down. I shipped it back and it cost me 28 dollars to do so. Still haven't heard any confirmation on whether they have revived it yet and still no refund for the tablet or the shipping cost. Learn from my mistake and stay clear of this product and spend the little extra for a quality Android.

Reviews.Title: Great first tablet for your kids
Reviews.Author: A. Rodrick
Reviews.Content: It works like my Ipad , but the price was far less and I wont feel bad if the kids break it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent first tablet for my 6 year old
Reviews.Author: A. Rodrick
Reviews.Content: Pros: The price was great, the ease of use is great,Cons: Very hard to find replacement wall charger,car charger, I have one on order from engine69, hopfully its the correct one.

Reviews.Title: the zeepad works great but
Reviews.Author: Gregory sudds
Reviews.Content: i brought two and one of my 14 year old daughters power button has been push in now it won't work at all. what can we do about this ? i really like your products and would like to continue to buy but.  I need the peace of mind when something goes wrong we can resolve it in a timely you have my contact info

Reviews.Title: it was broke
Reviews.Author: Gregory sudds
Reviews.Content: This product was broke when shipped or received the screen did not work and was cracked i shipped it back to china and have not received any info yet ,and cant seem to find a number on them please resolve this problem

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: jwjaram
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's 7th birthday.  He loves it!  It does everything we need it to do, movies, music, books, games...and more!  Android devices are easy to work with!

Reviews.Title: Kid friendly tablet
Reviews.Author: NolaBigDawg
Reviews.Content: I purchased the tablet for a four year old, I didn't want be an expensive in fear of it being broken by children.  I was expecting it to be just something for the kids to play angry bird on. To my surprise it was really a good tablet, you can download from google play, screen was really responsive, and the micro Sd slot was really a plus.  I would definitely by another in the future

Reviews.Title: Junk!
Reviews.Author: DJ BRAND-X
Reviews.Content: Dont buy it.  I cannot for the life of me figure out how to download anything with this piece of junk!  So disapointed.  I thought it would be a pretty good deal because it was at a good price and it would have made a good xmas gift.  Its been sitting under the coffee table since the day after xmas because its trash!

Reviews.Title: Did not work for me!
Reviews.Author: Jade
Reviews.Content: This would have been a great product for my 8 year old, if I could only get the touch screen to operate to input the Gmail info. Maybe I just got a defected tablet. *shrugs* It has been returned and I ordered something else. Hopefully this will work much better.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Pamela Dunbar
Reviews.Content: Love the color, awesome item and received in good time. This was a gift for my oldest granddaughter she will be using it as she goes off to college in the fall.

Reviews.Title: very nice for Grandma
Reviews.Author: servozoom
Reviews.Content: a nice tablet for "disposable" use, give it to the kids or seniors without worry,  Cheap and that's the way it should be.  The KISS rule....  a simple basic tablet.  Use free app Wifi Oh Player and stream from your network.

Reviews.Title: Kids love the Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Terry L. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: Wasn't quite sure what to expect since the price is so much lower than others out there.  Delivery was way quicker than they estimated. Came in perfect condition. Kids love it and haven't put it down since it arrived. It does everything it said it would and they love the color. I am planning on ordering another for the kids and one for myself!!!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7"
Reviews.Author: bobbye
Reviews.Content: It met my standards. Just wish it had Bluetooth and a backside camera. The battery life was a disappointment, after on a few moments of movie watching it had died.

Reviews.Title: Better Then IPad if you just what something small.
Reviews.Author: Jason Pittenger
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife that is not a techie. She has a I phone a uses it but her Nook was first gen. This works like a good e-reader, Facebook, and Pandora tablet.

Reviews.Title: Its actually not bad.
Reviews.Author: Arnie Posadas
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandmas 1 year old nephew and I had the chance to test it out first and install things before letting the baby handle it. It is pretty responsive for its price and it even got most of the common things that are available in most products like camera, wifi, OTG cable. Although this one did not come with bluetooth, probably for the cost. I was planning to use a bluetooth speakers because although this device comes with speakers..... the sound is really low when trying to play a lullaby song.Overall, you get what you paid for and for this one, I think we got more than what we paid for.

Reviews.Title: Barely adequate...
Reviews.Author: Nick L Coombes
Reviews.Content: I knew at $65 that I was pushing it but this tablet is very buggy. I have a permanent pink line to the left of center screen and it has lots of issues...That being said...useful for travel...but that's about it...

Reviews.Title: Not a bad Tab
Reviews.Author: Thomas L. Cole
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 18 year old daughter who likes it very much. It can Skype and works with Google Play so you can get new apps. She uses it as an ereader and for chatting with friends. In all it is a nice tablet, comfortable in your hands, is very thin and has a good picture. The battery life is not as good as high end tablets about 4 hours of use but, is better than expected for the price of the tablet. I did not expect it to be this nice of a tablet and have been very surprised with its performance. She has not used it for watching movies yet but it works well for checking email and weather when you are in a hurry

Reviews.Author: Tyrell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my wife a week before Christmas, the price was awesome.  I recieved it on Christmas Eve, just in time for Christmas morning.  And my wife loves it.

Reviews.Title: Really good tablet
Reviews.Author: Gina Paola Cepeda
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the product, it is easy to use and I bought it because is going to be a surprise for my mom. Although I cannot find a way yet to use the keyboard I bought with this tablet.Please I really need help finding out how I can set the blue tooth up on the tablet if this this is the only way to make it work.Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Decent product for the price
Reviews.Author: Andrew A Beach
Reviews.Content: I purchased two.  They are fine for what I wanted.  I wanted something that our kids could play games and watch movies when we travel.  It's not an everyday device.  It doesn't sync properly with google.  The headphone jack is sensitive in order to get both sides to work.  It's less than 1/2 of the price of a kindle and 1/4 of the price of an iPad mini.  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Discret product
Reviews.Author: Luciano Zuniga
Reviews.Content: The tlablet is good. It has not connectio 3G, but is so good for read, and play some games. It is slowly, but It has all what you need for watch videos and some page web.

Reviews.Title: Started off perfect and a 2 weeks later, its crap
Reviews.Author: Aisha
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my twins 8th birthday. Two weeks after palying on it my son's won't come on at all. There is nothing telling me how to trouble shoot and it is one week past the return date so I am stuck with a tablet that doesn't work and my son is unhappy. I will never buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: QUESTION
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I am big on music I read that a memory card is best but dose it work with Facebook games and if it did how dose it work smoothly????I gave it a 3 just cause I'm being fare with the reviews that I have seeing I DO NOT OWN ONE

Reviews.Title: works good, shiped within time
Reviews.Author: Cory G "cory g"
Reviews.Content: iv had this product for about 2 weeks its worked great, it shipped in a timely manner. i would recommend this product to someone looking for a good low priced tablet. orderd a micro sd and case.

Reviews.Title: THis is a great little pad
Reviews.Author: Carol "Mother of 3 rugrats"
Reviews.Content: Does what i need it to do...much cheaper than Kindle that kids broke LCD screen...at this price i could buy 4 Kindle fires.  Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: I am amazed!
Reviews.Author: N. Bolser
Reviews.Content: It works! and works well.  I have almost no experience with tablets, really have no idea what I'd do with one, but for the price, I figured I'd find out what its good for.  Still working on that part, but this little device is way more than I'd expected.  I nearly sent it back, could not get it to connect up to my wireless at home.  Took it into a local shop and asked nicely if he could get it to connect.  There it was.  Went home, reset the router and the Zeepad immediately connected.  It was me, not the Zeepad.  Off to the Google Play Store...A month later.  I still very much like this little tablet.  Had a terrible time connecting it to the computer by USB, but finally figured out that an option to "debug the USB connection" was checked off.  Sounds like a good thing to do whatever it is, but it stopped the USB connection.  Unchecked it, and bang, it was connected.Haven't found any apps it would not run, mostly games.  Battery life isn't great, but it uses the same micro USB as the cell phones we have, so finding a charger and cable is no problem around the house.  Added a 16 GB memory chip, so the Zeepad is loaded with videos, talking books, epub books, and handles all well.  It did not like the high resolution videos, so ran those through Format Factory to knock down the resolution and shrink the size.  Very watchable.

Reviews.Title: rosmary
Reviews.Author: rosmary rueda
Reviews.Content: muy biueno la tbleta, el color es fantastico, es un regalo para mi hija, tiene muy buenas caracteristicas, espero le guste,

Reviews.Title: It works but not for long....
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: I was not expecting an iPad type quality when I purchased this tablet, however I was expecting more than what it is. The display must be held at just the perfect angle for quality viewing, the battery life is abysmal, and with in 2 weeks the plastic bevel around the screen began to pop away from the backing. I WOULD NOT PURCHASE ANOTHER!!

Reviews.Title: Excelent product
Reviews.Author: Jesujiano
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, 100% recommended for anyone who wants to buy itI am close to buying one of these products

Reviews.Author: Moraima Materano
Reviews.Content: Was better than expected the product surpriced me with its quality and presentation-Great accesories-So Much qualityI recomend this product to anyone who waits for a excelent product

Reviews.Title: Low battery time
Reviews.Author: pallend
Reviews.Content: the tablet works fine the only problem is how long you can use the tablet on battery only, the answer is about 2 hours

Reviews.Title: Actually Not Sure
Reviews.Author: Jaime
Reviews.Content: I cannot really rate this product as I never actually got it. I was suppose to receive it in 3/19/13. It finally showed up on tracking like a few days after that and never made it here. To boot the company asked if  I changed my mind about it that when I received it to send it back to them, to Hong Kong - I'm guessing at my cost. They did refund my money however.

Reviews.Title: Horrible product
Reviews.Author: E. A. Moran
Reviews.Content: I had problems since  the minute I opened my box. had 1st one for only 2 weeks.. The second would not even work unless plugged in the wall outlet. Cheaply made. Buttons are inconveniently placed. Personally spend a few more bucks for a better brand.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: Kevin Schwarz
Reviews.Content: I followed all instructions, but it was stuck on the Android screen. Tried to put new firmware on it, that didn't work either. Easy return.

Reviews.Title: NOT GOOD!!!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This tablet s very reasonable, but its very cheap!!! I dropped the tablet on carpet and it broke.... I tried to get in contact with the company and they still haven't responded. Zeepad is very unprofessional

Reviews.Title: IAM SO GLAD MY FRIEND TOLD ME ABOUT THIS PRODUCT.
Reviews.Author: chasity
Reviews.Content: IT VERY EASY TO USE MY SON LOVES IT..  IT IS SMALL ENOUGH I CARRY IT IN MY PURSE WHEN HE DONE PLAYING IT .  THE ONLY THING IS I WISH THE BATTERY LIFE LASTED LONGER..

Reviews.Title: Cute little Zeepad gadget!
Reviews.Author: Jannie Annie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet as a reader for my granddaughter. I decided to test it out before giving it to her. I have to say I am quite impressed with it. It worked great right out of the box. I followed the directions and charged it 2 1/2 hours before using it. It is so cute in pink. The graphics are nice and the speed is good. It has some handy pre-loaded aps such as Facebook, Google and fun games I know she will like such as Angry Birds and Fruit Ninja. It is so much more than a reader. I've only had it a couple of days and it has an ap for the reader but I haven't had time to test that yet. It completes with much more expensive tablets so I have to say so far I'm very happy with this purchase and you certainly get much more than your monies worth!!!!

Reviews.Title: My 9 year old  grandson love it
Reviews.Author: correy bradley
Reviews.Content: No problem easy to operate n downloads it came in excellent condition and I will purchase another one in the near futre

Reviews.Title: Best for games, not for internet surfing
Reviews.Author: Pete Sakes
Reviews.Content: My Android cellphone with budget service (Boost) has an easier time loading webpages than the zeepad running off of wifi.I bought this for my daughter, however, and it is for her to download and play android app games, not surf the web, and it is great for playing games. I have had a few freezes, but only while trying to visit webpages, none yet during game play. I will update if anything goes completely kablooey with it. I'm pleased with what I paid for it, as it works for its intended purpose. Had I bought it for personal use, I would be very, very disappointed. I purchased a GTAB Nero by Matricom for myself and had to return it. It was practically dead on arrival. Now I've purchased a (slightly) more expensive iRULU 9 inch for personal use. I haven't received it yet, so we shall see...
