Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Stoneman
Reviews.Content: Great product. The package was received on time. it was brand new in great working condition. my daughter hasnt put it down since I gave it to her. I am very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Biggest piece of junk! Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Nate G Man
Reviews.Content: I received my Zeepad very soon after ordering it but when I opened the box I found the screen already scuffed up.  I figure it was a cheap tablet so I shouldn't expect too much but I couldn't even run applications without it locking up.  Do not buy this tablet!

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: Steve Barczewski
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son for his birthday and he loves it. Definately worth it even though it is cheap it works great

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: wendy hunsinger
Reviews.Content: The zeepad is just what I was looking for and the price was right. I would recomend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: IMPORTANT RUN AVG OR SOME ANTIVIRUS AS SOON AS U GET TABLETThe tablet comes installed with games and 2 of the games came up as potentially threatening so if u just hand it to your kid and they try to play those games u are at risk I use avg pro its still$15 bucks but I have it installed on 4 devices so worth the money u can get it in the play store this tablet is awesome but an adult should go thru all the settings and run spywear b4 handing it over to kids as I said in my updates whoever rooted the device changed the settings if u run avg it will walk u thru the settings at the end of the scan to protect your deviceI bought this tablet for my 18 month old daughter because she is determined to keep up with her older brothers and loves all the learning apps available for young toddlers I must say this tablet is great for her im going to try to find a kid tuff case of course the tablet is on the cheaper side I only paid 76 bucks im not complaining all the apps work and this tab has options to delete installed apps and options to move apps to sd card I did not have those options on my galaxy so not bad at all shes gonna be so excited to play her word games when she wakes up from naptimeUpdateJust realized this tab comes rooted I know this is a high selling point for some it makes me a little nervous but so far so good I will update again if anything else pops upUpdateSo my daughter loves it the abc phonics games are a must for anyone with young toddlers the zeepad is definatly great so far of course the speakers suck and itscheap plastic its only $76 bucks I recommend going thru the settings whoever rooted it set those kind of weird still tweaking them my daughter doesnt want to let go of the thing its great for kids and budgets I cnt afford an ipad and if I could im not handing It to my child so this is a great way for u to let your youngster play without losing out on $500 or more if they drop itUpdateDay 2 with the zeepad the charger works its battery life definatly isnt great and it depletes even when your not using the tablet but I also believe those small annoyances to be the reason the zeepad is available for such a cheap price its a wonderful beginner tablet for young kids it comes already installed with kids games and is obviously intended for kids but as I said before if your on a budget an adult could find this useful also its not the fastest or the best thats why its so cheap but its still more than enough for my daughter to watch her shows and play her apps I would definatly recommend this tablet to others great purchaseUpdateThe tablet is still working despite the fact my 18 month old has been drooling and pushing on the screen a little harder than I like then again I bought her the zeepad so she wouldnt abuse my galaxy anymore so I guess I shouldnt complain reading the reviews are what helped me make my purchase and they are also how I determine what seller to purchase from that is ehy I keep updating I feel like this tablet is a good deal if u purchase from a reliable seller and supervise your kids charge it for them its not a tank they can still break it make them sit on the couch while they play it instead of running with it this tablet is cheap and has tons of features but its not durable or it would cost more if u want durable spend $100 more bucks and u will get higher quality this is a great beginner tablet its still quite fast for a single core processor and has tons of features runs netflix youtube and my comcast apps all fine on comcast I have to log out then back in somtimes for it to work but for it $76 delivered its not that big of a deal plus u can install apps that require root access my tablet doesnt do that and to buy higher end rooted tablets is at least $100 more on top of what the going price is so im assuming the negative reviews are the people who bought from the seller at the very bottom offering the dual camera on the probably fake zeepadsUpdateIts been a couple weeks now the zeepad is still charging and works great I only charge it about once a week but I also shut it off when my daughter isnt playing it I think this was a great deal my daughter loves it and it plays all her movies and games without any problemsUpdateThe zeepad is still working just got done loading a bunch of free mp3 songs for my daughter off of the free app I got off google play I really dnt understand all the bad ratings for my$76 bucks this is an amazing deal we have 3 samsung galaxy tab2 also and this tablet does just as much a little slower at times and not as good quality but for the price this is a great dealUpdateSkype works and all of the other apps we have loaded on here just got done reading elmo and dora ebooks we downloaded on the kindle app I still cnt figure out why people dnt like this tablet I'm writing my review on it rn the battery isn't that bad and why would u want your child playing 5hrs of games a day anyways either way zeepad still works and we still love it

Reviews.Title: ZEEPAD, SELLER DracoTek Please Read
Reviews.Author: Damita J Pannell
Reviews.Content: I had to contact the seller because the shipping address was incorrect. I chatted with Amazon and they sent a request to Draco Tek. I also sent an email to Drack Tek and they responded within 48 hours...I was impress with the seller and Amazon for helping me correct the shipping address. I purchase this item on March 9,2013 I received this item on March 23, 2013 sooner than promised. I brought this product for my grand-daughter she is 4 years old and is very savvy with my iPad 4. I brought this product for the price and for what it can do. I was some what disappointed because when I received this product everything was their except the stylus pen, the box came with 3 different type of chargers. One was USB, AC adapter and one for using a flash drive. The USB and AC Adapter does not work I tried it and the charge stayed at 1%. So I tried a different USB and it started charging so I left it to charge overnight. I tried it the next day and it did not charge more than 2%. The product request that you charge it the first time 6 hours...so I was disappointed that I still could not use this item. So I tried another charger that I had and this charger was charging I started charging at 9:00am and it was fully charged be 2:00pm.  Finally I was able to see what this could do and so far it works okay. I know folks say this was inexpensive...however you should always receive what the seller is selling and the item should do what the product states it should do no exceptions.  I brought this base on what the product offered. Money should not be a factor...just because some items cost more does not make them a better product. I could send this product back after all if the product cannot work because you cannot charge it then it is no good to you...major flaw. I think Drakco Tec Store which is located in China should read their customers reviews. I did read the reviews and had mixed emotions. Being a buyer at Amazon and trusting Amazon I took a chance. I have purchased a lot on Amazon since March 9,2013 and I'm learning a lot about the sellers and shipping. I what have rated this product higher because it does work and it is a good buy...however not being able to charge this item is very huge for me. Please take the time to read all reviews...their was a lot to read. I read all of the reviews after ordering. So I did know there was a possibility that the charger would not work. So I did gather up all of the old chargers I had collected over the years from old cell phones which save the day...so in the end it did work out. I will do a much shorter review after using the product longer.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price especially.
Reviews.Author: David Draper
Reviews.Content: works really well, for the price i am extremely happy. My girls have enjoyed them and they are pretty sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Had To Send Back Already
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter and haven't even had it for a week and I get a black screen when I turn it on so I am returning it.  The battery life on this is horrible as well.  I read the reviews and thought that the reviews were ok so I purchased it.  I don't know if I just got a defective one but I'm not going to find out because once I get my refund I will be purchasing something different.

Reviews.Title: just ok
Reviews.Author: Yolanda
Reviews.Content: bought this product for my cousin but tested it for abit, the tablet is working ok, not the fastest but ok speed. my one disappointment is that it came with a few scratches.

Reviews.Title: Bad Tab
Reviews.Author: CaliNative
Reviews.Content: This is not a good tablet. It constantly freezes, and deletes the things i have downloaded. I am mad i even baught this, because it is a complete waste of money. half the time it doesnt even really turn on when i want it to, thats how delayed the reactions are!Do NOT buy this.The only thing this is good for is that you get a stylus with it, and at least they couldnt mess that up.You have to buy an external memory card for it( which is good becuase you can have switch memory cards out..)but it constantly deletes my stuff from the app store, and i dont know why.when i received it the packaging was terrible, and i thought that it may have been damaged.I have never seen more spelling mistakes than i have in the manual of how to use this product...its like they didnt even use spell check!!!this sucks, dont be fooled by the price and think this is a steal...

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: M. Anema
Reviews.Content: It's a little slow at times, definitely not a games tablet, though all angry birds games play just fine. For a simple reader, it's very good. Battery life is very good also, lasts for a week with my use. I've been able to install all the productivity apps that I have on my iPhone, they all work great (with wifi, of course). One note- don't bother trying to get to the website to flash the firmware- the English is so bad it doesn't make any sense!!!!

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for his birthday. We gave it to him just to find out that it won't work. WiFi says its connected but won't connect to the play store. It won't connect to any pages on the internet. Not happy with it and now we have to purchase another tablet for my son.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: krissyh78
Reviews.Content: These are very durable and great to do about anything.  I bought it as a gift for my 9yr old and he absolutely loves it.  Only downfall is that the battery does not keep a long charge.

Reviews.Title: Great Device!
Reviews.Author: Matthew L. Keiser
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our 2.5 yr. old.  After downloading some children's aps it didn't take him long to figure how to turn the device on and off and open his games and puzzles.  It is quite durable and has survived a couple of drops to the floor and keeps on going.  The screen resolution is no i pad retina but we're not streaming movies or anything like that.  My wife and I have a few of our own aps as well and we love to use it too.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: FooFoo123
Reviews.Content: I must admit, When I first got this tablet I was VERY IMPRESSED! but after 2 months of use, it no longer would charge and would freeze up ALL THE TIME. Returned and bought a better one with a 8GB.

Reviews.Title: Very good value priced tablet
Reviews.Author: Larry A. Costigan
Reviews.Content: The screen isn't as bright as the Apple or Google tablets (I have both), but functionally it's right there with them.  Very nice tablet for the money.  Great value!

Reviews.Title: Great gift for 7 year old!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this tablet.  We haven't had too much trouble using it with her, save for one app that decided to quit working.  Only real gripe is that the Micro USB port is positioned at the top of the unit.  Meaning you have to drape a connection to a USB keyboard either around the tablet or behind it while it's positioned in a case.  other than that, great!

Reviews.Title: my kid loves it
Reviews.Author: FIDO
Reviews.Content: its a good bad for a kid not that expensive and it douse the job, you get what you pay for

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my 8 year old daughter and for everything she uses it for this is perfect! A good starter tablet!

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: Ana Carrera
Reviews.Content: its okay for the price, and well what can i say my little niece likes it, so that is good. but needs improvement

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: hubiet
Reviews.Content: I LIKE IT EXCEPT THE DOWNLOADS ARE VERY SLOW. IT DOES GET TO MY E-MAIL VERY FAST.THIS IS MY FIRST TABLET AND AM AMAZED AT WHAT IT CAN DO. BATTERY LIFE IS VERY GOOD FOR ME.WHEN THIS ONE FAILS I WILL UPGRADE TO A NEWER ONE THAT IS FASTER ON  THE DOWNLOADS

Reviews.Title: Nice starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Andrew Fong
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet, and I've been pleased with it. I bought it knowing that it's not a high-end samsung or iPad. Some times it seems to hang a little bit on commands and there seems to be a slight dead spot on one of the corners (which is only a problem if I oriented it that way so that the "back" button is on that corner).If you just want a very inexpensive tablet to fiddle with, like I did, this is a nice product for that.

Reviews.Title: For the price it passes muster
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Now to start off we are not talking a Nexus 10 tablet or an I Pad so if thats what your seeking then this is not for you . First off the good points i observed is it comes preloaded with a couple of games ie: Angry birds and a couple of kids games which is what this is really geared to . I bought this for my 9 yr old nephew knowing full well it was not going to be a top of the line tablet . It accesses the internet on WiFi only no Ethernet port that i observed . It is relatively fast but again we only talking 512 mb ram so your not talking lightening fast . It has a decent camera with it and also a built in microphone , both as i have said are decent for what your paying . Its only really bad downfall is it's battery life . Even fully charged its battery might last you an hour depending on what your doing with it . It seems to use more power using the internet than the games. Possibly because of it being on wireless .i am assuming you will not be able to use this in a wireless hot spot because you do have to set it up to detect your wireless configurations on your device at home . But if your looking for something for the kids to use and don't want to spend 500 bucks or more on an I Pad  then this might serve the need . Just make sure your power cord is readily available .

Reviews.Title: Great for eReader and Web Surfing
Reviews.Author: A. NAVA "PaperPusher"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife's birthday.Sorry not to tech savvy on the unit's particulars but here's what we use it for:Pros: Great eReader Tablet, she uses the local online Library to check out books and is a big plus!Web surfing through our home wireless network works pretty good and watch videos 'netflix', 'youtube' with no problem.Also fun with our newborn son interactive android apps.Battery life is pretty decent (i shut off the unecessary apps).Great price for what this tablet offers!Cons: the camera has a low resolution but ok for starter. The instruction booklet was not really helpful but gave enough hints to figure out some configuration (network, navigation, setting up accounts, etc..)The camera has low resolution pictures come out grainy in medium to low light, have not tried with bright lights.Overall, a great beginner's tablet. Very functional for ereader, websurfing, checking email, and simple apps.

Reviews.Title: Zees Pad Vas Pretty Gud
Reviews.Author: Matthew David Schvaneveldt
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. Not the fastest tablet by far, but would be a great beginner tablet for kids. Charges through USB port as well as the supplied charging cable.Cons: Screen viewing angle is sub par.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Elias
Reviews.Content: Bought these as surprise gifts for two straight A grandkids to use as ereaders. They were perfect and work perfectly

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: Terrence M. Anderson
Reviews.Content: At this point I'm still discovering lots about it.  Not satisfied that it came without software. the Net  & You Tube was very Helpful  with features and operation.

Reviews.Title: Screen cracked when touching with finger when playing game
Reviews.Author: Vincent Giordano
Reviews.Content: Poor construction broke within 3 months. Glass cracked when playing a game. Not a very good value when it lasted such a short time.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: jenifer hammel
Reviews.Content: i wasted my money on a cheap knock off then i bought the zeepad and i love every thing about it

Reviews.Title: For what it is worth ...
Reviews.Author: Lorane
Reviews.Content: I actually got this Android tablet only for the Google Play store. I have a Kindle Fire and Google Play doesn't work on the Fire. The Amazon store is quite limited. So I use the Zeepad to get apps and then transfer them to the Fire. I really don't use it for anything else. The battery life is quite horrible. I keep it turned off completely and turn it on when I need to. This might be OK for a child to play with or for someone on a limited budget who wanted a tablet.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: jackie
Reviews.Content: buy it for my daughter, why not let me use my phone ... was a great solution, and it works well, the only thing is that sometimes it is hard to select options on the touch screen

Reviews.Title: Worked for a few days then crashed!
Reviews.Author: Nelly
Reviews.Content: We received the tablet and the first two days it worked great but then crashed. The screen went blank and did not work regardless of what we tried or by contacting customer support. When we tried to return it and exchange it for a new one, they first stated they would pay for the return shipping but later wanted us to pay for the return shipping and said they would refund us. By other comments I realized that other customers were never refunded and I knew that the shipping would be close to the same amount of what we paid for the tablet. It was a good working tablet at first but you will be taking a chance of this happening to you as well.

Reviews.Title: follow up.....Seller replaced tablet..excellent service from company
Reviews.Author: wyatra patterson
Reviews.Content: I wanted to follow up on my past posting of this product. Let me start off by saying the company contacted me and sent me a replacement, they even refunded my shipping cost to my credit card. The previous product could have been damaged during shipment. My son loves the tablet. I am in the process of ordering a jacket cover in case he drops it.It come preloaded with a game, but you can always download more free games from the internet. I recommend this product.The touchscreen is great and responsive. The web pages load great.

Reviews.Title: So far so good..  I take that back!
Reviews.Author: Steve D. Yates "The Yates Family"
Reviews.Content: Product came super fast, packaged well. Daughter loves it, but still learning things, like where to put the music. Not of caution; the user guide was obviously not written by a person who speaks English. The moderately tech savvy person can figure it out,but if you have no technical skills this may pose an issue. Other than that so far so good. Will update if necessary.October 2013This item is crap! Now it won't charge after seven months, spend a little extra and get a better one.

Reviews.Title: Execelent Product.
Reviews.Author: Moises Caballero
Reviews.Content: is a Good Product, sure is not an Ipad or something like that but its good enough for the price.

Reviews.Title: On time but discharging so fast
Reviews.Author: Connie!!!
Reviews.Content: I consider this product ok because I was specting It has a durable charged battery. I goes down faster. That make me disappointed..sorry but It is happening...in the other hand the applications work fine.

Reviews.Title: it works great and fast i like it
Reviews.Author: sihame
Reviews.Content: it works great and fast i like it  for the price is really  great better than to buy an expensive and your kid can broke it at any time . now I put game on it. I put my pdf courses that I use them when I study while I am riding the train. I put word and excel on it and it work perfectly I download videos the image is great. the only think that I don't like is the camera is only a basic one not sophisticated but does' t bother me. I am satisfied with that product

Reviews.Title: Ehhhhh. Its ok.
Reviews.Author: David Johnson
Reviews.Content: The tablet shipped very quickly!! I opened it up and the tablet was brand new. No problems at all except for lag and the screen is crappy otherwise its good for the money.

Reviews.Title: This tablet is awesome!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lakesha green
Reviews.Content: I give this tablet 5 stars. This tablet is awesome. I brought four tablets as gifts for my kids and they just love it. I was easy for me to set up wifi on it and it was very easy to download various apps and games using the google play store. Great tablet for the price. I'm thinking about getting one for myself.

Reviews.Title: had a problem
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: The mini usb port stopped working on 3rd day, although tablet fun and seemed to work great otherwise , my android keyboard would not work which took 50% of the fun out. I had to return to Amazon , no problem there, they payed for return shipping and issued me an immediate refund which I am happy for. I am getting a very similar replacement, my son and wife and keeping their zee pads  so far they are doing ok

Reviews.Title: Very good.Fantastic.
Reviews.Author: R. Clear
Reviews.Content: Price excellent,and work fantastic,my grand...es happy. I will buy soon another one.everything work fine in this product.thanks.Richard.

Reviews.Title: MY LITTLE BABY IS HAPPY WITH IT
Reviews.Author: Romer Garcia
Reviews.Content: IT VERY NICE.THE PRICE IS EXCELENT.IT WORKS LIGHTLY AND POWERFULL.THE BATTERY DESCHARGES TOO FAST BUT IT WORK OK.I LIKE IT VERY MUCH.I LIVE IN VENEZUELA AND MY BABY IS HAPPY WITH IT.

Reviews.Title: Piece of garbage
Reviews.Author: GrandFacilitator
Reviews.Content: Where to start... Shipping took nearly an extra week (seller issue, not the product but I figured it's relevant). The screen was only attached by the ribbon cable and kept falling out. It was gift for a kid on Christmas so we dealt with it. He's only here on the weekend so it didn't get much use and we figured it would be ok. The screen eventually fell out and cracked down the middle. They wanted another $40 to fix it and stated there is no manufacturer warranty for hardware issues, only software. Besides the poor construction it also didn't function very well. One of the main selling points was for him to be able to Skype with family members and it couldn't handle both voice and video at the same time (crappy processor?). We tried from our PC to make sure it wasn't the connection, once we turned off the video option off it functioned ok at best. Terrible terrible product, filed an Amazon dispute.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase this.
Reviews.Author: Camille
Reviews.Content: After having this tablet for less then a week it no longer holds a charge and wont even come on. I'm pissed off because I purchased it specifically to take on a trip with me so I wouldnt have to carry a heavy laptop around and I could read ebooks and use the other features like internet and netflix during my trip. I am extremely dissappointed and I will be returning it. It was a complete waste of money and time. Now my trip is in 4 days and I'm out $100 until I get my refund, and I have no tablet to bring with me to the trip. I could have spent that money on other stuff.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for my son
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my son and he is enjoying it. It has all the features and functions that he  wanted.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: zeepad
Reviews.Content: Im more than satisfied with the zeepad it has match my expectations and is just great, i take it everywhere and is always there with me no matter what

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is as I expected. It is my first experience with a tablet and I have nothing to complain. Internet works, the battery lasts long enough, everything is conveniently arranged. It took me some time to realize that you cannot us the device when it is charging.

Reviews.Title: Zeepads 2
Reviews.Author: patty
Reviews.Content: I have 2 Grandsons that really love to play their ZEEPADS. They have them loaded with their favorite games. They take them with them everywhere they go.

Reviews.Title: great gif
Reviews.Author: cora lu
Reviews.Content: I placed the order for a friend This was a gift for her son I have not heard any complaints I assume the children is happy because my friend has not mentioned anything

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: alicia  murphy
Reviews.Content: this is a good product i love it it does everything that it say it can do i would recomend this tablet to all of my friends or to any one for that matter. it ia fast as it says i love the games i love everything about it.

Reviews.Title: instructions
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: It would be OK if you are smart at these electronic devices. The instructions are not easy to understand and able to read

Reviews.Title: Good purchase for my children!
Reviews.Author: Hernan
Reviews.Content: Used for about a week by my children of 5 and 7. Hope these tablets continue working well! The only issue with the 2 tablets received is the quality of video calling by using Skype (better to turn off the video and just talk).

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Julie Miller
Reviews.Content: The kids loved thier new tablets, easy to operate, and very durable, we had purchased 2 other tablets that lasted 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: francisco rodriguez
Reviews.Content: used it for a few months and enjoyed but it but something happened with the power cell and now its just a big old paper weight. now i have to get it fixed..

Reviews.Title: Too slow for YouTube and Pandora
Reviews.Author: P. Pan
Reviews.Content: Hello,  This product is good for basic internet search and e-mailing.  I was hoping to use it to watch YouTube videos and listen to Pandora radio while traveling without having to have my laptop with me. It was very hard to control the volume as it would constantly go to zooming instead, disappointed, I chose to return the item, paid $11 shipping and they charge 15 percent restocking fee.

Reviews.Title: Recomendado como vendedor
Reviews.Author: franklins sifontes
Reviews.Content: Muy responsable , productos llegaron a tiempo y en buen estado.. recomiendo  abiertamente. . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: nick
Reviews.Content: Great deal for a tablet. Works good and great apps on the android store. I like everything about it and am 100% satisfied

Reviews.Title: great little tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Patricia Moorman
Reviews.Content: I consider it money well spent, it is very easy to take it with me everywhere I go. great buy

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Maria Adams
Reviews.Content: This small pad is easy to use and light weight. My daughter who is 10yrs old enjoys it the most.

Reviews.Title: Good little Zee Pad
Reviews.Author: Patricia Folsom
Reviews.Content: After seeing my Granddaughters that she received for Christmas I thought this would be something to pass time with while on field trips and waiting for the kids. It's not real fast but gets the job done. I just wish the battery would last longer because sitting on a bus you have no way of charging it up. All in all it's a great little pad & my other 2 Granddaughters are getting them for their birthdays.

Reviews.Title: Died after a months use
Reviews.Author: Theresa2674
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these items for my children for Christmas.  Both had to get shipped back to Engine99 after a months use.  One of them, there is no longer any sound.  The other one, the power button broke and got stuck inside of the unit.  I shipped everything back at my cost (approx $25), to only get a call from them saying that I have to purchase parts for repair and that they are giving me a great deal.  Sorry, but a great deal to me is to fix the unit at no charge at all since it died after 30 days!!  I paid the $20 parts fee.  I also asked what the guarantee is on this "new part" that they are installing.  They informed me that there is no guarantee on it and if it breaks again, I must pay for it again.  I do not recommend this product.  Also, this product went on sale almost half off 20 days after I purchased it.  Fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Great for what I wanted it for
Reviews.Author: ellen.nbs
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tablet to use when traveling to play games and check my emails from - this is super for that. The only negative comment I have regarding this product is that it does not hold a charge very long. Need to keep it plugged in if I am using it for longer than a half an hour or so. Great for the kids to use so I don't have to give up my phone or laptop.

Reviews.Title: zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: THOMAS JACOBSEN
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as an entry level tablet /e-reader and is just about what I expected.I have experienced no real issues performance wise,I am quite satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: capacitive screen too sensitive.  random characters
Reviews.Author: M. Marcotte
Reviews.Content: 2 out of 2 were disapointing.  Don't buy cheap tablets.  You get what you pay for.  Battery life is 50 percent of similar well known tablets.

Reviews.Title: thank god
Reviews.Author: helen
Reviews.Content: Finally we have a winner. Its great. Works fast. Its durable. Last long. Great for the kids. My friends loves it

Reviews.Title: Sadly, this was a disappointment
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these for my grandsons for Christmas.  They were awesome units, but within 2 weeks of use, they both crashed a few days apart with sudden grid lines going in both directions.  I emailed them asking for a refund, but they insisted I send them back for repair.  I did, and after several emails back and forth (they couldn't find them, needed my tracking number, etc., which thankfully I had and kept), asking the status of the repairs, they finally agreed to send me a refund.  I will say they promptly did process the refund, but I am out the return shipping for the repair.  They are a great concept, but I honestly cannot recommend them, at least from the company I purchased them from on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good toy.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Rossetos
Reviews.Content: Does everything I need it to do with email, apps, and surfing the net.  Also enjoy playing a good game of chess on it.

Reviews.Title: my new tablet
Reviews.Author: teresa o'dell
Reviews.Content: love my new tablet easy to use, and cheap...and it's easy to carry around and use it at work on break...

Reviews.Title: Fantastic buy!
Reviews.Author: Gargirl
Reviews.Content: My 14 year old daughter got this for Christmas from my boyfriend & the product was great.  She managed to break it though in less than two weeks by putting it in her over filled backpack so she bought herself (this) a replacement.  Great product for the money!

Reviews.Title: Zeepd
Reviews.Author: dianamozee
Reviews.Content: I loved the Zeepad, but it became defective after only two weeks. I returned this item on January 13th, and have not seen a response one way or another from engine 29. This is very unprofessional. I liked the Zeepad just fine, it was a great little tablet, I am however unhappy with Engine 29

Reviews.Title: Lasted one month
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: This was a fine inexpensive tablet for a month. Unfortunately the wifi quit working as soon as the return window expired and will not turn on, making the tablet useless. I've done a factory reset and tried getting the wifi to work in several different locations with no success. Trying to turn it one results in a "turning wi-fi on..." message which never goes away and never connects. Would not recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: great buy...
Reviews.Author: Qadir
Reviews.Content: came very quickly.bought this for my wife to use as an ereader...she loves it...its working very well,no problems so far...cant complain...however wanted to buy one for myself but it went up by $16.

Reviews.Title: rbowers
Reviews.Author: rbowers
Reviews.Content: This is suppose to be new I paid for the new one and got a used sratched one that runs slow.

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: rbowers
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these one black one pink suppose to be new, but they both seem to be used,since the screens are scratched and they run very slow. They are for my children and they cannot understand why they are scratched and neither can I.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 before this one in local stores and neither worked great.  This one is a great deal for kids who want a tablet but parents don't want to spend the money for the more expensive ones.

Reviews.Title: Screen is terrible / wireless is not working correct
Reviews.Author: S. H.
Reviews.Content: It took a month to get it in the mail, the screen is not good quality, there a lines that go through the screen. One of my friends purchased this item as well, after a few weeks the charger piece and power button fell out, she was not able to return it. I would rather pay 70 dollars more and get a kindle fire or google android tablet, and don't have to worry about it falling apart.

Reviews.Title: broke, won't charge after 1 month
Reviews.Author: putput
Reviews.Content: Broke after about a month.  The charger that came with it broke right away and then we charged it with a cell phone charger, then it quit charging altogether! JUNK!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding item
Reviews.Author: LeRoy Campeau
Reviews.Content: I have purchased this as a gift and my granddaughter loves it. For the money this gift is awesome when it comes to down loading apps and the learning apps help her.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Gabrielle
Reviews.Content: I bought as a gift for kids ages 5-10 & they seem to like it, so I guess that's all that matters. Took a little longer to arrive but I guess since its coming from overseas then it goes through customs.

Reviews.Title: Price matches Quality
Reviews.Author: Alejandra J "Zen Mind"
Reviews.Content: 79.00 for a tablet computer is pretty cheap.  Sounds good for our 9 year old son.  He had it only for two weeks.  The power button got loose and fell inside.  The screen got slightly scratched.  The screen was hard to see unless in a perfectly lighted room, not too bright.  If your child is not hard on equipment, thre Zeepad may be a great starter computer.

Reviews.Title: not impressed
Reviews.Author: Felicia W
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom for Christmas, and she only plays games on it. Since it uses WiFi only, she's not able to use the bible at church, even though that was basically the only reason I purchased it. She's unable to download the bible for use outside of WiFi.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Stephanie L Buchanan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to run a few apps.  It streams videos great.  My only very minor complaint is the viewing angle.  You must be looking at it straight on and not from an angle or you get the gray screen, which is no big deal to me.  I would definitely get another one.

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: amii
Reviews.Content: good product and gret  price for a 5yr old toddler and a preteen the love it. looks nice in a case as well.

Reviews.Title: otherwise I'm satisfied...
Reviews.Author: glaudimar
Reviews.Content: actually wanted to add that the sound is very low, I buy other headphones and ecuchaba better and higher. so I advise you to throw away the headphones that brought and buy better quality ones.otherwise I'm satisfiedsaludos desde venezuela

Reviews.Title: greatly satisfied
Reviews.Author: sherry
Reviews.Content: The tablet works wonderfully.  Thank you so much. The little computer arrived well packaged with cool accessories. It's a beautiful color. The pink tablet started right up with no problems. It attached to my home Wi-Fi effortlessly.  It's really neat and is communicating with my other toys well so far. I've only used it twice now, but it seems quite cool. Thanks. Sherry

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: nisha
Reviews.Content: Very good tablet for the price. Brought for my nephew and he loves it. Referred to others for their kids and they love it also

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: meeka
Reviews.Content: It was delivered on time.The price was a steal $83.00 just hate after I ordered it the price droped to $63.00 I purchased the pink tablet for my 7yr daughter to keep her off my phone.Let me say she LOVES the tablet works it like a pro.

Reviews.Title: took to long
Reviews.Author: monica
Reviews.Content: We were happy to get it for our grand daughter we ordered it january 4 th and it took 3 1/2 weeks to get it this the slowest moving i have ever gotten on line and after it got here it had lines going through it.

Reviews.Title: help
Reviews.Author: res
Reviews.Content: now it will not boot past logo screen and I can't find anyone who knows how to do a hard reset.98q

Reviews.Title: Zee is no i, but its good for kids
Reviews.Author: David M. Fitzgerald "-Admiral Dave"
Reviews.Content: It's a good buy if you have realistic expectations of what you are paying for. My boy loves it and it works with the most of the popular apps and games from Google Play so far. It would not play Grand Theft Auto, which leads me to believe that support of intensive 3D games could be spotty. Battery life isn't great so bring the charger if you will be using it when out and about.

Reviews.Title: excitement died quickly
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: Product seemed ok upon arrival but quickly had issues with dead spots on screen and freezing up a lot. Had great hopes for it but that excitement died down quickly.

Reviews.Title: Bought two of them
Reviews.Author: trudy carey
Reviews.Content: Got these for my grandsons at Christmas. I didn't want to buy a high dollar one due to their ages. They love them! One of the boys dropped his while charging and it did not break! A adult might want something more but for the price..this one is great!

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: A.Sellhausen
Reviews.Content: I bought the tablet for my boyfriend for Christmas. i was disappointed the only way to get sound was to use earphones. We didnt find out right away. Other than that you get what you pay for. He likes it but i will buy a better one later on.

Reviews.Title: GREAT FOR KIDS
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I brought this for my daughter it's a great price and I loved everything that came worth it but it would not let me connect to the internet w/wifi. The wifi button was defected b/c it froze and i couldn't do anything.

Reviews.Title: Sucks
Reviews.Author: Jon Gold
Reviews.Content: I didn't even get it this guy rips you off. Don't get it I'm telling you. Don't fall for what I did.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad review
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The first one I received was DOA. It only worked for the first 8 min and then came back on again. I had to return it back to get a new one. The second one works great and I haven't had any problems with.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Shavon Mo
Reviews.Content: My baby sister can't get enough of it.... all she wants to do is play on her tablet. So its very good

Reviews.Title: wrong tablet
Reviews.Author: shakur
Reviews.Content: I ordered the zeepad paid 94.00 and git a 49.00 cheap no name android tablet from somewhere in China with instructions written in Chinese. So disappointed! My rating is 0 stars til I get the correct tablet!

Reviews.Title: Many problems
Reviews.Author: lisa walker
Reviews.Content: So far we've had difficulty with every task: downloading games, netflix, setting up email, getting it to charge...everything. It's been a headache.

Reviews.Title: a great tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: michelle drabek "momof3_theyremyworld"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 7 year old... A GREAT PLUS is that it came with Google Play, so we can download all her favorite games and find new favorites!  This tablet is darker than it looks, it's more of a hot pink (deeper in color)...which is perfect for my daughter!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: Tweety
Reviews.Content: The tablet works great! Value for the money is totally there. Works as good if not better than the name brand tablets. Only reason I did not give 5stars is because unpaid extra $22 shipping and it was 2days later than expected arrival. Thank God it made it before Christmas!

Reviews.Title: Best gift
Reviews.Author: Steph73
Reviews.Content: I got this zeepad for my daughter. I was a little worried about how it was compared to other tablets, but it turned out to be the best investment I made. It has so many features on it for adults too. I love the apps.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: tykeisha
Reviews.Content: i love this tablet i bought it for my four year old daughter and she loves it.  I would recommend anyone to get this tablet especially if you want something small and cute to do all your little internet tasks.

Reviews.Title: Good value for price
Reviews.Author: Terri Metcalf "one happy mom"
Reviews.Content: I bought a Zeepad for my 5 year old for Christmas. So far, she loves it and it keeps her off my phone! I wish it were a little faster, but that could also have something to do with my internet speed.  It is certainly worth the low price I paid for it.  She loves the pink color too!

Reviews.Title: I RECEIVED THIS ITEM BROKEN/IT IS IN TRANSIT COMING BACK
Reviews.Author: DARWISHA RUSH
Reviews.Content: I RECEIVED THIS ITEM BROKEN/IT IS IN TRANSIT COMING BACK. THE ON AND OFF BUTTON KEEPS GOING DOWN INTO THE TABLET AND ONE OTHER BUTTON IS OFF COMPLETELY. MY DAUGHTER DID NOT ENJOY HER CHRISTMAS. SO, IF SHE IS MAD, SO AM I.

Reviews.Title: super deal
Reviews.Author: jodee
Reviews.Content: everything i expected n more still learning all features love it want another one  it is evev kid friendly great deal also 4 price

Reviews.Title: ZEEPPAD is pretty good for an affodable tablet
Reviews.Author: jessica
Reviews.Content: My son loves it and all the apps that he can get helps him learn a lot of cool stuff. A good bargain tablet for a 4 yr old.

Reviews.Title: amazing!!
Reviews.Author: MTLin
Reviews.Content: My wife picked four tablets for Christmas, I picked this one. She absolutely loves it!! She even got our son one after his more expensive one broke five days after receiving it for Christmas! Would recommend for ages four on up!!!

Reviews.Title: great product for the price
Reviews.Author: CLAUDIA OCHOA
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for my 9 yrs old daughter for Christmas. I am very impressed it is everything they said it would be. We added a 16gb sd card to it and it helps keep the hard drive quick. We have had it for about a month it runs great and my daughter loves it.

Reviews.Title: perfect gift
Reviews.Author: hmarie
Reviews.Content: It came in on time and was exactly what I expected. Got it for my 8 year old daughter. Perfect...

Reviews.Title: love the zeepad
Reviews.Author: nikie boyd
Reviews.Content: my daughter love this product so much and also love it to and apparently some one else loved it to because a week later it was stolen but I will be replacing it very soon but I love it It deserves ten stars!

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Heven
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it... Although Everytime I try to log on Netfilx it won't load, but other than that it's and awesome tablet for her:)

Reviews.Title: good for the price.
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Product is fair. USB port stopped working 2 days after I received the item. Also shipped with a defective USB cable. Did receive earlier than was stated by the shipper though, so that was a bonus.

Reviews.Title: wont last forever
Reviews.Author: Chelsea
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my 4 year old to keep her off my phone, we downloaded a kid lock app where we could control what she could and couldn't do and she has enjoyed it very much!  Notably slower than my phone, but apps like Angry Birds and Temple Run did not lag at all.It is still a light weight tablet and did not last more than 4 months. There are two charging ports and eventually both of them gave out making the tablet unusable.Spend a little more for a dependable longer lasting tablet. Avoid Allwinner, Zeepad, TabNero,Chromo, Tagital, Matricom and ZTO. They are all the same tablet under different names.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Bunny
Reviews.Content: Ordered it just before Christmas...got it on time!!!  It was a gift and the person who got it loves it.

Reviews.Title: so cute!!
Reviews.Author: C. Watts "PR lover"
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my daughter... its perfect!! almost all her games were free i was able to lock the play store from unexpected purchases.. only downfall which isnt the companys fault is locking the setting feature!!

Reviews.Title: from Michigan
Reviews.Author: nancy weeks
Reviews.Content: bought this for grand kids ages 4&5 they can navigete them well and love them, they love to play games on their tablets.

Reviews.Title: I finally got one!
Reviews.Author: P. Mitchell "prmit"
Reviews.Content: I received tablet  within  the stated time frame. Was excited about that considering  I never received my tablet from the first company I ordered from.The tablet was purchased as a Xmas gift for a 5 year old and it appears to be perfect for that.  The screen is not hd quality, the headphones appear to be needed for sound, and the touch screen can be unresponsive at times but for the price I think it serves it's purpose pretty well, so far. I had no problem setting up the WiFi and logging into the internet.  Downloading games was really fast too.  I think my grandparent will love this. I' m considering buying 2 more for my other grandchildren.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT!
Reviews.Author: LINDA DIEBOLD
Reviews.Content: Bought for my kids for Christmas!  They have downloaded all their favorite apps and when they are at school, I play with it! LOL

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: poorboy
Reviews.Content: This Zeepad android i order for my Granddaughter is not what I expected...Cant download games; and someone keeps sending e-mails to the address.  I have even tried to download free games and always get an error..The most thing my granddaugher like is she can take pictures and Video..Now I have to figure out what to do, also, the product said it comes with Netflix...it don't.  I have Netflix account and tried to access through Google, got through but still could not watch movie, it seam to just stall.  My thing is I think this is a refurbished Zeepad; because it was already set up under someone else account...

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised
Reviews.Author: NITA MASSEY
Reviews.Content: It was to have apps preloaded in it, It came completely empty and would not connect to wifi. this is my second attempt to buy one of these.

Reviews.Title: Zee pad
Reviews.Author: Bree
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for the price . Got it for my 10 yr old and she can do everything on it just using wifi , not on problem .

Reviews.Title: I was amazed
Reviews.Author: cyndi
Reviews.Content: Ok so i never write reviews i just read them but in this case i had to write one. The product is great. I bought it for my 7 year old as an x-mas gift. It was the best gift ever.The wifi and hot spot work great with it. I have cricket cell it like the tacobell of cellphone companys but even with all the troubles the zeepad still functioned well. It can pick up the wifi while driving in my car and the kids just watch movies making for a much more enjoyable ride.I would recomend this to anyone looking to get a tablet for there kids without spending hundreds. they also come in very "cute" or "cool" colors so you never get them confused.For the buget conscience family this tablet can do it all and fast. I sometime use it at stores instead of my smartphone because it works faster.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for daughter
Reviews.Author: nancy gronewold
Reviews.Content: Bought this for dd for Christmas. It is perfect, allows her to do everything an 8 year old needs or wants to do.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: ruben
Reviews.Content: i got this tablet for my wife for christmas and she loves it. she used to have a kindle but she likes this a lot better.

Reviews.Title: like them really well but am having troble with the charger
Reviews.Author: michael t bennett
Reviews.Content: other than that they work great AND THE KIDS really enjoy them I aam curantly dealing with the company over the one that wont take a charge

Reviews.Title: Great product! Great seller!
Reviews.Author: MJinPalmSprings
Reviews.Content: I bought this product as a gift for my 10 year old to play games, go online and watch music videos on. She loves it! It was very easy to set up, arrived on time and included instructions in the box from the seller on how to set up various things/troubleshoot. The screen does have a slight glare but other then that very user friendly and perfect for a budget tablet.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: celestialbev
Reviews.Content: I really liked all the accessories that came with this product and the price was great. The tablet comes with access to Google Play, a definite bonus. My kid loves the color. Here is what irritated me to no end. The enclosed stylus had rough spots on the barrel and scratched the screen, then the screen saver. Thankfully, the scratch is small and I don't think we have ever had a touch screen without a scratch, but I was irritated that it was enclosed and of poor quality. I quickly bough new styluses for the tablet and all is well now. The table is working out wonderfully for my child and you can expand the memory with a MicroSD card, a real bonus in the realm of budget tablets. I recommend it. Just check out the end of the stylus before you let your kid use it ;)

Reviews.Title: works great!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: bought this tablet for my younger sister as a gift and it works great, this is my first time doing a reveiw but i'm confident when i say its a great product, mind you i was scared because of some of the previous reveiws on here but mabe it was just thier bad luck i mean hey things happen, but it works like a charm.1. right out of the box it was running (i told her to let it charge up first but she never listens lol)  battery life so far so good it last up to 5 hours and that is with her surfing and doing god knows what on it.2.i downloaded the kindle app for her and the goolge one as well as the amazon app store, that went well as well she got 2 books already, in the app store there is a errrow message about loading the game app conserning our adress no idea why but i havnt looked into it so i'm not gonna comment on that at this point. she uses her face book, youtube, even a site that i usally watch movies on and no problem there.3.the SD card i bought with it was a 32 GB that was installed ok and the Wi-Fi is great she uses it on the porch, in her room, the bathroom lol well just all around the house. we bought the keypad case for it but that is another story ( was working fine then just stoped) but as long as the tablet doesnt just stop i dont really care bought the case.even if its the first time i heard of Zeepads i took a gamble and i am a happy customer, now the thing is i bought a second one a black for my mom it arrived with a cracked screen, yea i know guess my luck ran out lol, well i left a e-mail to the buyer hope the will handle me with ease cause the black is for my mom is she is none too happy so lets see how they handles this lil issue, i'll be sure to keep you posted with and update later.i recomemd this to those looking for something fun small and hasnt got a tone money to spend, i'm getting for myself so you should too!!

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: cory
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old daughter so she would stop asking to play angry birds on my ridiculously expensive cell phone.  The zeepad met all of my expectations and works perfectly for my 5 year old's gaming habits. Also its cheap enough that if she drops it on the tile its not a huge monetary loss as if I were to buy her a more expensive tablet, but at the same time it can do all the same things as the $500 ones.

Reviews.Title: do not buy this
Reviews.Author: Anna Seeger "the goodbee girl"
Reviews.Content: My daughter got this for Christmas and within a week the pen was broken.  The tablet never allowed us to type certain letters so we could not log into our google account and download apps.  Sent it back

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Got this for our 8 year old daughter.  She loves it!  Easy for her to use.  I already have an Android type phone, so she already knew how the App store worked.  She has been able to download lots of free games and activities. The only thing we are still trying to figure out is how to get her some music.  But, over all...GREAT!

Reviews.Title: Purchased for my 4 almost 5 year old granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Gramma B
Reviews.Content: She only puts it down to tend to her new baby alive doll  Loves the preloaded Ninja Fruit game Great item

Reviews.Title: Like a big android phone but a little better
Reviews.Author: redd-fish
Reviews.Content: I own a Samsung stratosphere phone that runs on android 4.0 and this tablet looks and feels almost just like the phone except larger. The only real difference is that the apps tend to be more encompassing and sort of like a medium between what you would see on a phone and a laptop. It's a very nice substitute for a laptop if you use the right apps and perhaps buy a keyboard for it (the virtual keyboard is nice but I wouldn't want to write an essay on it). The battery life is great just as long as you don't leave the wi-fi connected to it all the time (I've had it on for almost 3 days and the battery is at 65% w/o using wi-fi). The screen resolution is a bit rough but not unbearable. Overall, for the price it's a great little device. I didn't mean to rhyme that .

Reviews.Title: Fair
Reviews.Author: Nky
Reviews.Content: Like: the color and size was perfer for my daughter, the price was affordableDislike: Very fragile.  Do not buy it for kids yonger than 10

Reviews.Title: Not durable
Reviews.Author: Nky
Reviews.Content: like: size and price.Dislike: very fragile.  I wish the product was stron enough to last more than one week,  the parts came apart and the screen broke.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: Clothilda Smith
Reviews.Content: I like the size, its for my little girl and she loves pink so i like the colour but if i had notice that it only has a front on camera i probably wouldnt of chosen this model

Reviews.Title: Pink zeepad <3
Reviews.Author: amber
Reviews.Content: It works just as good if not better than my friends kindle! I would recomend this to anyone love it! Such a great deal aswell!

Reviews.Title: Not bad but not great either
Reviews.Author: Richard F. Giersch "Rich Giersch"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this and a Kindle HD at the same time. It works well enough but is not terribly well constructed, feels flimsy and the screen is loaded with scuffs and scratches after just a couple weeks of use.  It needs restarted at least once per day due to it acting strange.  Under the same cir cumstances, I'd buy it again.  Not a good substitute for a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price`
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 9 year old son for Christmas.  It's definitely not an iPad.  Has a plastic face that scratches easy.  Some things don't adjust to which way the screen is turned and looks like things are missing, for example putting in the passcode. But for $80 bucks I just wanted something that works okay and maybe last a year since.  What can I say, I'm poor.  So far my son has loved it!  It has a good operating system.  Connects to the internet.  Nick can download games and watch Netflix.  So far so good!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Christy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 2 yr old grandson so he could play Angry Birds! He loves it. The only thing is the volume is not very loud but other than that he loves it!

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Jessica Harding
Reviews.Content: We bought for 13 yr old as a Christmas gift and its great!  Simple to use, everything is pre-built, connects easily!

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: This was given as a gift to a grandchild. I love it and so does my granddaughter~! This is an excellent learning tool

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I gave this zee pad as a gift to a grandchild who loves it! This was a great gift choice for an 8 yr old who is learning how to use computers.

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal garbage.
Reviews.Author: Clam Canoe
Reviews.Content: Do yourself a huge favor, and save up a couple of extra bucks, and buy an HP Touchpad 32GB from eBay for like $150. It's almost 10" and fast as hell. These things are total crap. Cheap Chinese tablet that's virtually unusable. Horrible.

Reviews.Title: great product!
Reviews.Author: wow
Reviews.Content: We got this for my sister for christmas and she hardly puts it down! It is a great tablet and she adores it. In her words 'its like a cell phone. I wont need one of those now that i have my awesome tablet!'

Reviews.Title: Good for kids
Reviews.Author: Pary
Reviews.Content: Product came on time. Bought two for my kids.  Now they don't have to fight over my phone to watch Netflix or play apps.  Good price

Reviews.Title: The Wife loved it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Since I bought this for my wife she uses it all the time and she even sleeps with it beside the bed.  Money well spent.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Finnerty
Reviews.Content: This tablet was purchased as a Christmas gift for my young granddaughter and it fits the bill perfectly.  It came with a pretty pink gel casing and the start-up was easy enough for this grandmother to sort through.  It plays Netflix well and all of the free kids' games we downloaded for free are running easily.  My daughter says she loves it as much as the little one.  The screen is clear and the speed is generous enough not to be frustrating.  A real winner for the price!

Reviews.Title: really great item
Reviews.Author: deandra barr
Reviews.Content: really nice, they work very good and my husband love them to.. everybody should try on n the price, love it.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price!
Reviews.Author: kristy
Reviews.Content: Overall a good tablet. My daughter loves it! The charger sparks when you plug it in so I would get a new one, but so did the one for my cell phone so I guess its not that uncommon. It works great and having almost everything I wanted preloaded on there is a big plus!

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Jessica Shivers
Reviews.Content: I bought this device for my 5 year  daughter for christmas. So far so good. It does everything that my android phone does and more. She has enjoyed playing games and using the different apps. The only downfall is that the battery doesnt last all day but for the price I can't complain.

Reviews.Title: POS!
Reviews.Author: SS817
Reviews.Content: Let it be said....You get what you pay for! & Buyer Beware! The pad is very slow, i bought it for my 6 year old and she loses interest in it quickly because it takes so long to start an app.

Reviews.Title: Its ok i guess
Reviews.Author: Tawnie
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my son he loves it .. its slow also.. although i ordered the pink one for my daughter and never got it and had to file a claim.. the one i did get was an ok tablet.. saddened my daughter never got hers for xmas though..

Reviews.Title: ZEEpad...great
Reviews.Author: marco
Reviews.Content: ZEepad is a great tablet. I just recived it today came with two games already installed (angry birds,fruit slice) the tablet is andriod 4.04 & has play store. Front camra is alright. Speakers are good and pretty loud. Bottom line its a great tablet at a great price.. Recommended

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: prettyme
Reviews.Content: came on time neatly packaged and it runs very well i love it cant complain i would recomand to others

Reviews.Title: poor product
Reviews.Author: Chad Layman
Reviews.Content: Poor product, it won't even turn on.  Company refused to exchange for another one.  Extemely disappointed, it was a Christmas present.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: KillahCox
Reviews.Content: It worked for about 2 hours.... All of the sudden things would start to open and close and all sorts of things. Don't waist your time and money!!!!!

Reviews.Title: no word excel
Reviews.Author: kasey hampton
Reviews.Content: nice tablet love the google market  but i need word so 4 out 5 it is cause it said it had word

Reviews.Title: This seller has caused me trouble
Reviews.Author: Richard1876
Reviews.Content: This seller ( importers127 ) offered me a black Zeepad with accessories at expedited 1-3 day shipping ($22.00) and sold me nothing but lies and would not respond to my emails.The item took forever to arrive and came pink. It also quit working after one month and my money was just a loss.This was a horrible Christmas gift for my 11yo son.Importers127 did not seem to care ... I expected better!!! Beware and don't purchase from this seller.

Reviews.Title: just bought a new one
Reviews.Author: Steve fox jr
Reviews.Content: I did like this tablet but it broke so I sent it back to China after 2yr wait and I heard nothing but keep checking in to Amazon I just bought a new one

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money!
Reviews.Author: VALERYE BLAIR
Reviews.Content: Two of the buttons broke within the first week.  It wasn't being used by toddlers, it was being used by 12 and 13 year olds, so I didn't expect it to break.

Reviews.Title: do not buy!!!
Reviews.Author: jesse sheets
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 and both broke within a month.. One was broken when we received it, the screen would move on its own. The second one quit charging. Definitely not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Delivery time and Awesome Product for the Price!!!
Reviews.Author: chris prater
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet for my son's bday on a Monday night and recieved it on Thursday morning, which was awesome! I opened it to try it out myself and the response time on the touchscreen is great!, it came loaded with a few games and Google play store, which is what I was looking for as my son loves dling apps and games! I think for the money, it was an awesome, capital AWESOME buy!Quality is good, it came packaged with everything included (earphones, chords, stylus even!) I am extremely satisfied (: and to whomever is looking for a tablet, look no further!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal for tablet!
Reviews.Author: AshleyMarie065
Reviews.Content: My daughter begged for a tablet for her 5th birthday- I told her if she saved the money. She saved a little over $80, so she didn't have much choice than buying a "cheaper" tablet, and ended up with a hot pink zeepad. This was PERFECT for her! So perfect, my 3 year old ended up with one for birthday just a month later. Now, being 8 months later, I ended up buying one for myself so I can stop stealing theirs. Granted, they use theirs for children games and learning games, including ones that have taught them to read. Mine is used for the Kindle app for the most part, since the screen is bigger than my phone, but I also use it for many other things, including Facebook, Twitter, etc. It's great! My 5 year olds is the only one I had an issue with, and thats because she kept dropping it- then I bought us all cases. And the only thing wrong with hers is the volume button stopped working. I think it's well worth the money, great for any age!

Reviews.Title: Yeah zeepad
Reviews.Author: NikiG
Reviews.Content: It was great but I sent it back to get the upgrade (dual camera). I bought it with the hope that it will be able to play Startfall (a learning site for kids) but you have to pay for all the apps whereas the website is free. I have not yet discovered how th find and use the office programmes (word, excel etc).

Reviews.Title: Beginners tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Cool tablet 4 price. Really good for you if you're beginning to use a tablet. the price is cheap so you get what you pay for, of course is not an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Total let down
Reviews.Author: mom of 2
Reviews.Content: This tablet we bought two, horrible. We were so excited to have new tablets and they skipped, broke and snapped on us. The power button came loose and it wouldn't hold a charge well at all. When we tried to find the manufacture, there was none. No warranty just SOL.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: annette
Reviews.Content: great little  pad for the price, does anything i need.  i would recommend this to anyone alot of technology for the price

Reviews.Title: horriable
Reviews.Author: sandra wood
Reviews.Content: it hasnt worked from day one and is almost totally shot before its 30 days old. would not purchase this item

Reviews.Title: trouble
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Trouble right out of the box. I think I would have loved this product...if only it had worked. The screen was bright and crisp, but that was the extent of anything good I could say about the thing because it failed to function. Fortunately the vendor took it back for full credit.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: lainey p
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with the quality of this product. The first one I got would not hold a charge, so I had to order a replacement. The seller was very good about sending out a another one, so I give them props for that!The replacement is no better. Apparently, you get what you pay for in a tablet!

Reviews.Title: don't bye
Reviews.Author: andrea
Reviews.Content: I been waiting for three weeksand abbr got it yet if i could give it 0 stares i would you should not have to wait this long for something asst they price

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: Idntunderstand
Reviews.Content: Was the color n price I wanted to pay for my daughter and came nicely packaged but wouldn't power on. Very upset about it after I had to patiently wait for it and it was supposed to b a birthday gift. It just ruined my daughters day. If a no star rating was available that's wat it truly deserves

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: ancp
Reviews.Content: When i received it, the screen had already been used improperly. If you touch anywhere on the screen it shows a place that had been pressed too hard on the screen.

Reviews.Title: freaking perfect!
Reviews.Author: Wendy Cromer
Reviews.Content: I love it!! its perfect for what i needed it for. took a min to find a case it would fit in cause its small. but as a Pure Romance consultant i LOVE the fact thats its PINK!!! :) <3

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Mgilleo
Reviews.Content: The screen goes blurry and pixelated look. Then the charge cord quits working all together. Completely useless now being I cant charge it

Reviews.Title: Won't Charge
Reviews.Author: sjbmom
Reviews.Content: This is a cute tablet and did everything my 10yo wanted,  except charge. If someone put slight pressure on the plug to get it "just right" it would charge. She was trying to lay it against a pillow to charge when I discovered the problem. Seemed like a fire hazzard to me so I am attempting to return the thing now.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Retrosexual
Reviews.Content: Got this to replace a tablet with cracked LCD for a 7 yr old.  So far, it performs just fine.  her only disappointment was that it didn't have EverNote app.

Reviews.Title: buyer beware you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get something that was budget wise when it first arrived i was excited cause i bought 4 for my 4 kids..they were charging and was working but after 1 week, 3 of them wouldnt charge anymore even if it was plugged in the power wont turn on..the screen would freeze..and now only 1 is working functional..i'm crossing my fingers they either let me replace them or get a refund..there goes 300+ bucks down the drain

Reviews.Title: this product is no good
Reviews.Author: Maribel Lebron
Reviews.Content: This product came defective. it freezes alot and changes sites on its own. Now i want to return it and either exchange it or get my money back. I have to wait for the company, engine 29, to respond back and approve my return. This really sucks. It was suppose to be a christma gift now the person has to wait longer for a gift because it came defective.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: This product is no worth it price it freezes all the time I got it for my sisters kids and they couldn't even do anything with it. Every time they clicked on a n application the thing froze then the battery was horrible it was only good for 10 mins this is not a good product and there were no way to get a case for it either.

Reviews.Title: The product came on time
Reviews.Author: kane
Reviews.Content: I got the Zee pad for my 15yr old and she loves it. the apps are easy to install. I brought 4 Zee Pad

Reviews.Title: A Seriously Good Deal for a Surprising Little Tablet
Reviews.Author: Shoof "trice di cinema"
Reviews.Content: My wife has a Google Nexus 7 tablet and the latter is my only frame of reference for functionality and quality.I purchased (3) Zeepads for my grandchildren and they arrived 12/22/12 instead of the scheduled 12/21.  All were about 85% charged.  Each Zeepad connected to my wi-fi home network in a matter of seconds.  Touch screen was responsive and a breeze to navigate.  I am pleasantly surprised with the overall build quality and remarkable functionality of the Zeepad.While not as fast as the Google Nexus 7, which has a hotter Arm Holdings designed processor, the Zeepad's speed is quite adequate.  I was drawn to the Zeepad since its processor is also an Arm design and the Android operating system is tough to beat.  Image or screen quality is inferior to the Nexus but decent.  The difference can be noticed when viewing the screen from an angle, but as long as the view of the Zeepad is straight on, the quality is good, not great.  To put the review in perspective, remember the Zeepad is well below $100 and, at this price point, I think this product is a real value.  Actually, it is a remarkable surprise.  My grandkids opened these on Xmas Eve and within seconds were connected to the net and gazing at more apps (mostly free games) on GooglePlay, where android apps are offered in abundance.  Did not experience any slowness as mentioned in some reviews.  Perhaps the network? Durability is an unknown since we have had the Zeepads for just few days so I'll follow up in a month or so.  While I was very skeptical that a tablet would do all the things claimed, after seeing the Zeepad in action, I wish I would have grabbed one for myself!

Reviews.Title: Frozen
Reviews.Author: Arrie
Reviews.Content: The first week this item worked fine, but after one week it it began freezing up.  Sent back to company.

Reviews.Title: Received a USED Zeepad!!!!!
Reviews.Author: I am 4 YHWH r u
Reviews.Content: I ordered in in Dec., it arrived Jan. 17th.  The first sign that this was not going to go well was the way it was packaged...or the lack of packaging.  LOL.  The tablet comes in the box that you would find it in any retail store, then it had only one layer of bubble wrap covered by a layer of packing tape. What kind of a company packs like this???  (it is not packed into a shipping box).It only gets worse, the screen is extremely scratched, and raised above the frame on one side, and it had a half worn sticker on it.  The WIFI must be within 2 feet in order to connect...but the browser doesn't work anyway.  Also the unit will not charge at all if the tablet is turned on.Despite all this we were able to download a couple of games that did work well and were a ton of fun at first, that is until they started to freeze up.I contacted the company on the 18th, and they responded back saying the item is new and "show us a photo where is the scratches.thanks!".  So I replied back with pictures.Next they agreed it was scratched and offered to send me "the film" to repair it and a new charger.There is so much wrong with this Zeepad that a screen and a charger wouldn't come close to fixing it.  I replied back that I did not pay full price for a used, disfunctional tablet that I would have to fix.Their last response was just one short sentence..."pls ship back we refund you.thanks"Evidently they also want me to pay to ship this useless, previously returned item.  It is so disappointing.  Hopefully they aren't planning to ship it off to the next unsuspecting person.Hmmm, I guess when I get back home I will need to dig out the layer of bubble wrap they used to box it???  I just don't have time to deal with stuff like this...how disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Don't Purchase from this company!
Reviews.Author: TNB "TNB"
Reviews.Content: Tablet stop working the first day i received it. 4GB is a lie, more like 1GB. I don't know if buying the TF card will help the limited storage problem, but it pisses me off because i can't download movies for my kids! I haven't allowed it to charge the recommended initial six hours, but battery drains very quickly! The return policy is ridiculous, 20-50% restocking fee for items that aren't defective is highway robbery! This company(Engine29) has a problem not the tablets. I've heard nothing but good things about the Zeepads, so i can only assume that they knowingly sell damaged products. It's suspicious to me, my items arrived without warranty info, generic user manuel, and no information on the product or on the user manuel about the maker of the product. Amazon suggested i "Bing or Google"(no lie) the maker, they only had an email address for Engine29. I'm greatly disappointed that Amazon doesn't have more info on who they do business with.

Reviews.Title: It didn't work consistently....My son couldn't wait for me to send it back!
Reviews.Author: Raina
Reviews.Content: It Froze.Wouldn't shut down.Was very slow.Didn't pick up quickly.Camera was not good.Son was very dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Virtually unknown.
Reviews.Author: Jason Thomas
Reviews.Content: While this device has performed okayish for the past few days since we got it, there is no information on the manufacturers or support what so ever! the device has no serial number, no fcc id and no way to contact the manufacturer for support. Already experiencing a few crashes and poor battery performance.

Reviews.Title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY1
Reviews.Author: dawson1mama
Reviews.Content: I ordered 3 zeepads one for each of my kids.  They recieved them for Christmas.  Not one of them made 3 weeks.  They would turn on and you could see backlighting on the screen but no picture.  I could excuse one not working, but not all three.  The first one broke 4 days after we got it.  Returned all 3.

Reviews.Title: Blah
Reviews.Author: DannyDevito
Reviews.Content: Nice color, but thats where the good ends. The damn thing freezes constantly. The LCD quality is pretty bad (think mid 2k's cell phone screens). They for some dumb reason put the phone version of android on, so it is constantly searching for cell signal even in airplane mode. You get about 30min of battery life due to this. Upon research, this is a common problem when putting the phone version on a tablet. To fix the issue you have to Root the tablet, and being it's a China tablet, probably not wise as it's almost guranteed to brick it. Save up and get a Kindle etc.

Reviews.Title: Lousy zeepad rendered useless after 1week  never received it.
Reviews.Author: larry powell
Reviews.Content: It stop working  after 1 week machine freezing  unable to open programs.not worth sending for repair I purchased insurance never came in mail.

Reviews.Title: Easy break
Reviews.Author: Ada Rivera
Reviews.Content: This I ten is poorly made. It was dropped once and the case came apart.  It was a gift to my niece, I was embarrassed.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the $60
Reviews.Author: Brenda Fonseca
Reviews.Content: I knew I was going to get something cheap but it is not worth it - I wouldn't even spend $10 for this device.  It was frustrating, slow, wouldn't charge and the screen was very poor quality.  Would rather have spent the money on craft supplies and let me kids play the old fashioned way

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: reinaldo garcia
Reviews.Content: poor image quality in a lot of issues not really happy with this item. picture quality is really bad bad

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware
Reviews.Author: Jamie Elisabeth Mathis
Reviews.Content: My sister bought two of these for my daughters last year for Christmas. The seller was Goodios.  She ordered them in November. The first order never shipped and they refunded her money without sending a note that it didn't ship. She reordered them two weeks before Christmas. They shipped from China and finally arrived in February. Of the two the charger for one didn't work. I wasn't too concerned because we could just use the other one.  After a week the charger won't make a connection with either tablet. It doesn't go all the way in and sit flush.
